line: Did she just call me tiny?

name: Heathcliff
line: She said you were tiny and cute. You should wave to them, Shino.

name: Shino
line: Don't be silly. Times like these, you're supposed to blow them a kiss with your thumb - like this.

name: Central Country girl
line: Aaaaah.....!

name: Central Country girl
line: He's cute, but he's also so cool!

name: Central Country girl
line: I love him too!

name: Shino
line: Heh. Did you hear them squeal? The girls from Central sure are cute.

name: Heathcliff
line: I guess I could learn a thing or two from you when it comes to your nerves of steel......

name: Central Country woman
line: Look at those adorable twins!

name: Elderly Central Country man
line: My goodness....! I can't believe children so young are working to save the world.... What admirable wizards they are........

name: Snow
line: Good day, Miss!

name: White
line: Good day, Mister!

name: Central Country woman
line: Good luck!

name: Elderly Central Country man
line: Don't push yourselves too hard, all right?

name: Snow & White
line: Hee hee! All right!

name: Figaro
line: You're putting on an impressive show, Sir Snow, Sir White.

name: Mitile
line: Wow.... The streets are filled with people.....

name: Rutile
line: Right, it's amazing! There are more people here than Mister Leno's sheep.

name: Lennox
line: You're counting them like sheep.....?

name: Faust
line: Hey, what happened to putting on a smile?

name: Lennox
line: Oh, that's right. ....Haha. Good afternoon.

name: Faust
line: Fufu. You're terrible at this.

name: Nero
line: Sigh..... I'm really not a fan of standing out like this......

name: Chloe
line: Really? That kind of Eastern sentiment feels like a waste. I love being the center of attention!

name: Nero
line: I don't get how you Western wizards are so cheerful.

name: Chloe
line: Everyone has their eyes on me! Everyone's waving at me! I feel like everyone loves me....!

name: Shylock
line: Fufu. You're so adorable, Chloe.

name: Chloe
line: Don't you like all this attention, Shylock?

name: Shylock
line: My specialty is charming people under the light of the moon, not the sun.

name: Central Country woman
line: Hey, sexy guy from the West! Is it true that Western wizards love to deceive and betray women?

name: Shylock
line: Of course it's true.

name: Rustica
line: Of course not, my dear.

name: Chloe
line: You two are completely different types, but you both know you're sexy.....

name: Shylock & Rustica
line: To a certain extent.

name: Rustica
line: Hm? Could that person over there be my bride....?

name: Chloe
line: Rustica, please! Not here!

name: Rustica
line: But Chloe.... Mmgh.......

name: Chloe
line: Come on, zip your mouth and wave!

name: Rustica
line: Mggh..... Ahahaha, good day.

name: Central Country man
line: Good day, good wizards!

name: Central Country child
line: Hey, Mister Wizard, can you show me some magic?

name: Murr
line: Sure!

name: Narrator
line: Murr stands up in response to the innocent child's request and lifts his hand into the air. When he utters his spell, rainbow-colored lights begin to cluster around the ring on his left hand.

name: Murr
line: << Eanul Rambul >>!

name: Narrator
line: They fly high into the air, bursting across the blue sky. And scatter like fireworks. Surrounded by rubble, the people of the city look up at the bright sky with smiles on their faces.

name: Central Country man
line: Amazing.... So this is the miracle of magic....!

name: Central Country woman
line: I'm sure they'll protect us from the next < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Narrator
line: The crowd erupts into loud cheers of delight, the people's faces lighting up with smiles all around. My heart wells up with pride; I've only known them for a short while, but it makes me happy to hear so much praise for these people who I've come to think of as friends. But amidst the delighted cheers, I hear somber voices.

name: Central Country man
line: ......Who are they trying to fool....... The Northern wizards are the crucial ones, but they aren't even here.

name: Central Country man
line: They always just do as they damn well please. Things must have ended up like this because they cut corners during the fight against the < Great Catastrophe >.......

name: Central Country man
line: At this rate, the world's gonna end next year......

name: Akira
line: ............ (......I knew it. Everyone's concerned about the Northern wizards......) (Snow and White are also Northern wizards, but......) (......Where are they...... Bradley, Mithra, and Owen......)

name: Akira
line: What's wrong, Riquet? Do you see a familiar face in the crowd......?

name: Follower of the church
line: ............Wizards are meant to be the disciples of God! What a deplorable charade!

name: Central Country man
line: Woah, what's wrong with you, old man! Don't start yelling out of nowhere on such a joyous day......

name: Central Country man
line: He's part of that sketchy cult. Just leave him!

name: Akira
line: Riquet?

name: Riquet
line: ......No...... It's nothing.

name: Cock Robin
line: Great work, everyone! The parade was a huge success! Frankly, I was worried that the crowd might throw stones at you, so it was a relief that everyone was so happy to see you!

name: Shino
line: You really don't have a problem speaking your mind.

name: Cock Robin
line: Heheh. The party will be held over in that hall. Please enjoy yourselves!

name: Shino
line: Got it. ...Huh, what's that room over there? Is that taxidermy?

name: Heathcliff
line: Hey, don't wander around, Shino.

name: Shino
line: This place is bigger than Blanchett Castle.

name: Heathcliff
line: Of course it is. It's where the King of Central Country resides; naturally it's going to be bigger than some castle way out in the woods.

name: Shino
line: But I like Blanchett Castle more. It's surrounded by the forest and a lake; it's beautiful. If Master and Mistress so desired, I would gladly make Blanchett Castle even bigger.

name: Heathcliff
line: Father and Mother simply wish to live peaceful lives; they don't ask for much.

name: Shino
line: But I want to grant them everything wonderful in this world. And I feel the same about you, Heath. But I guess I just made trouble for you.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....That's not true. I'm always grateful to you, Shino. Because you might be brusque, but you're always kind. When I fell ill and was stuck in bed all day, or when I was feeling down because my tutor scolded me - you always brought me flowers and squirrels from the forest. I still think of you as my little brother.

name: Shino
line: Little brother? You're the little brother.

name: Heathcliff
line: What? No, I think everyone would agree that you're the little brother.

name: Shino
line: No, I definitely take care of you more. So you're the little brother.

name: Heathcliff
line: You're so stubborn. Shino, you-....

name: Young Central noble
line: Heathcliff? Are you Heathcliff from the Blanchett family in the East?

name: Young Central noble
line: Do you remember me? We met at the testing center of the Aristocrat's Academy. I remembered you because you had the best score in the class - plus, you were so handsome. I didn't realize you were a chosen wizard.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Ah. Yeah.

name: Young Central noble
line: That's amazing! It's like you were destined to be a hero from the moment you were born. I'm jealous. I'd like to introduce you to my parents later....

name: Heathcliff
line: Please stop.

name: Young Central noble
line: ...Ah... Sorry... I got carried away.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....No, it's.... I don't want to stand out too much. Sorry about that......

name: Shino
line: Why? You should go. Let them speak highly of you.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino. This has nothing to do with y....

name: Shino
line: You've got plenty to be proud of: you're a chosen wizard who is as brilliant as Master and as beautiful as Mistress. I am proud to have you as my Lord. But if you can't stop being so ashamed of yourself, then I just look like an idiot.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....Shut up. You'd never understand, Shino.

name: Shino
line: .......... Is that so. Then keep your eyes on the ground forever.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Akira
line: Shino, where are you going? The party hall is in the opposite direction.....

name: Shino
line: I'm going home.

name: Akira
line: Oh, I see, you're going ho... Huh!? W-wait! Please wait! He's gone already.... where did he go!?

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Akira
line: ....There he is....! Wait, Shino....!

name: Shino
line: Woah....! Oh, it's you, Sage. Why'd you jump on me?

name: Akira
line: Because I wouldn't be able to follow you if you flew.... What happened? Why are you suddenly talking about heading home?

name: Shino
line: .......... Because I fought with Heath.

name: Akira
line: With Heath? Why did you guys fight?

name: Shino
line: Because Heath is ashamed of himself. Whenever Heath is ashamed of himself, I feel like he's ashamed of me, too.

name: Akira
line: Why do you say that....?

name: Shino
line: .......... ....Why are you asking? Is this part of your job as the Sage?

name: Akira
line: I'm not doing it because it's my job, but..... When I first arrived in this world, Heath was so kind and good to me. And you're so close to him, Shino. That's why I want to know why you're mad. Because you might have a bit of a foul mouth, but you don't seem like a bad person, either.....

name: Narrator
line: Shino gazes up at me. I can tell from his powerful gaze that he's not pondering over whether to tell me; rather, he's peering into my identity. Like a stray cat that's trying to decide if it should approach you or ignore you and move on. And once those stray cats decide to come close to you, they fear nothing.

name: Shino
line: I'm an orphan. I never knew my parents. But I could use magic, so I never struggled to feed myself. I knew what it was like to be loathed even before I learned the word "loathe." I could handle it just fine; it was easy. You just don't wish for friends. So long as you're aware that you'll never belong no matter where you are, you can protect your heart.

name: He's telling the truth
line: Shino doesn't show any signs of hurt as he proudly tells me about his life. But then, his voice grows soft.

name: Shino
line: But stuff happened, and as luck would have it, I was hired by the Blanchett family. Life at Blanchett was heaven. Master, Mistress, and Heath were all so kind and got along so well; they were my ideal family. I had never spoken to them, but I was happy to be of use to them. But one day, Mistress came to speak to me, bringing Heath along with her. She said.... "Shino, I hear that you're a wizard? Heathcliff is, too." "So I hope you and Heath can become friends." ..........

name: Narrator
line: Then Shino falls silent, as if his heart is filled to the brim. I can't tell why - but I know that his feelings are in turmoil. A painfully pure emotion is suffocating him.

name: Shino
line: ......When Mistress asked me to be Heath's friend...... For the first time in my life, I felt like I had a place where I belonged. I felt glad to be a wizard. Because I was a wizard, Mistress had reached out to me, and I would get to be friends with Young Master Heath. I was so happy.... And Heath was delighted too. I swore to myself that I would do anything for this family. ....But lately, Heath has been acting differently.

name: Akira
line: What do you mean....?

name: Shino
line: He tries to hide the fact that he's a wizard. Because it might start rumors about Master and Mistress.....

name: Shino
line: There will be stupid naysayers no matter where you go. You just have to ignore them. That's what I keep telling him, but it's impossible for Heath. For me, being a wizard became a source of pride, but for him, it's what brings him shame. He's the son of a noble, so I'm sure he has a lot to deal with. ....I get that, but..... Every time he looks down, I feel like he's trying to keep me hidden. I feel like he's ashamed of me, too. Sage. That's why I want to become a hero. I want to become an incredible wizard who owns a giant castle. One that will immediately captivate anyone who sees it. And once I do, I'll declare myself Heath's friend. Then Heath won't have to feel ashamed of himself, right?

name: Narrator
line: Shino gazes at me with the eyes of a child begging for a rainbow. I laugh and grasp his hand.

name: Akira
line: You're right..... Let's defeat the < Great Catastrophe > and become heroes who save the world. Let's build you a magnificent castle, Shino.

name: Shino
line: Can we? Really?

name: Akira
line: I'll do my very best. I'll become an amazing Sage so that everyone will hear out my wishes. But you know... Even without a fancy castle, I think Heath is proud to call you his friend, Shino.

name: Narrator
line: Shino falls silent. His big eyes, filled with determination, quiver as if he's holding back tears. He grins, and lets out a laugh.

name: Shino
line: Thanks for the thoughtful comment.

name: Akira
line: You're welcome.... So what will you do about the party?

name: Shino
line: I'll go. I hear there's going to be some delicious pie. Though I bet it's no match for the ones that Mistress bakes.

name: Akira
line: Do you like pie?

name: Shino
line: It's my favorite food.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Heathcliff
line: .....Shino!

name: Narrator
line: We turn to see Heathcliff, awkwardly scratching the back of his neck.

name: Heathcliff
line: ....The party is about to begin. You should come too, Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: I'll head over right now.

name: Heathcliff
line: What were you two talking about?

name: Shino
line: We were bad-mouthing you, Heath.

name: Heathcliff
line: Huh!?

name: Shino
line: Just kidding. Let's go.

name: Narrator
line: Shino laughs as he grabs Heath's hand and tugs him along. Heath looks worried at first, but gradually, he too breaks out into a smile. I want this world to become a place where they can smile together and be friends forever, without worrying about what anyone else thinks. I find myself wishing for that from the bottom of my heart.

name: Akira
line: (I need to do what I can tonight to help the relationship between wizards and humans.....) (It may not be much, but there has to be something that I can do.)

name: Drummond
line: ....And with that, I would like to conclude my speech. As the Minister of Magical Affairs, I offer well wishes to the heroes who have been tasked with fighting the < Great Catastrophe >..... The Sage and his wizards from the magic headquarters! Please give them a hearty round of applause!

name: Narrator
line: (Applause)

name: Chloe
line: Woah, this is amazing.... There's lots of people in fancy dresses.... And tons of gorgeous sweets, too....!

name: Rustica
line: Why are you hiding in the corner, Chloe? Come over here.

name: Chloe
line: B-but are you sure they won't yell at me? We're wizards. Remember that time we went to the festival, and.....

name: Arthur
line: Wizards are the stars of this party.

name: Chloe
line: Your Highness, Prince Arthur.....

name: Arthur
line: Please just call me Arthur, Chloe. Thank you for preparing such lovely robes for us. I hope you enjoy yourself tonight.

name: Chloe
line: .....Thank you, Arthur....! ....Ah, I feel like I'm living a dream! Rustica, let's go see what everyone's doing over there! Oh! Wait, there's something over here, too!

name: Rustica
line: Ahaha. Sure. You have my thanks, Prince Arthur.

name: Arthur
line: The same goes for me.

name: Chloe
line: Hurry, hurry!

name: Rustica
line: Slow down, you don't have to pull me along.

name: Arthur
line: Haha..... Please enjoy yourselves to the fullest. I hope wizards will extend an invitation to humans, and humans, to wizards; take this opportunity to get to know each other. For tonight shall be a commemorable mixer between humans and wizards-....

name: Akira
line: A-Arthur! I don't think we'd call this a mixer.....!

name: Arthur
line: Really? All right then, it's a commemorable banquet to celebrate new meetings. Cheers!

name: Murr
line: Cheers!

name: Shylock
line: Cheers. This champagne is better than last year's.

name: Murr
line: Is that a good thing?

name: Shylock
line: Very.

name: Central Country scholar
line: Good lord! Are you by any chance the great philosopher Murr?

name: Murr
line: Meo~w!

name: Shylock
line: I'm afraid not. He's just a stray cat.

name: Nero
line: They're using some really good wheat for this bread.... I guess you'd expect no less from the royal kitchen. If he were here, I bet he would've scarfed it all down and made a real mess....

name: Faust
line: Who is he?

name: Faust
line: You're certainly secretive.

name: Nero
line: ....You're the last person I want to hear that from. Hey, where are you going?

name: Faust
line: I'm headed out to take a break. My excuse is that I'm still recovering from my injuries.

name: Nero
line: Yeah, sure - you mean you hate parties.

name: Faust
line: I mean I hate this castle.

name: Central Country noblewoman
line: You're such an excellent dancer.... I never knew such gentlemanly wizards could exist.....

name: Rustica
line: It's an honor, my beautiful lady.

name: Central Country noblewoman
line: Do you by any chance have a wife?

name: Rustica
line: I'm currently searching for her. When I find her, I plan to trap her in my birdcage for eternity.

name: Central Country noblewoman
line: My goodness, even your sense of humor is delightfully passionate.....

name: Rustica
line: Oh, I'm quite serious. Would you like to enter this birdcage as well?

name: Chloe
line: Rustica! I was looking for you! Come on, we're headed that way!

name: Rustica
line: ....Excuse me, dear lady. I hope to see you again.

name: Chloe
line: Rustica, you're seriously too soft when it comes to women.

name: Rustica
line: Do you still have trouble with them, Chloe?

name: Chloe
line: Just a bit.... I mean, I know they're not all like my family, but. I love how kind everyone here is! They told me my clothes were fashionable!

name: Rustica
line: That's wonderful.

name: Rutile
line: It's so lively and fun. I wish I could've brought my students along.

name: Lennox
line: The parties you held at school were lovely too, Rutile.

name: Rutile
line: Thank you. Ah, that hat is so cute! I wonder if I can recreate it with the fabric we have at school?

name: Lennox
line: You should ask Chloe how to make it.

name: Rutile
line: Yes, I will!

name: Cain
line: What's wrong, Riquet? Why do you look so gloomy - aren't you excited about the party?

name: Riquet
line: I can tell that you certainly are, Cain.... There's lipstick on your collar.....

name: Cain
line: No, no, don't get the wrong idea! I just got caught by a rather drunk lady.

name: Riquet
line: Really....?

name: Cain
line: Of course. I know how to exercise proper judgment - I'm a knight, after all.

name: Riquet
line: Sigh......

name: Cain
line: How about you, Riquet? What's going on?

name: Riquet
line: I think I saw someone from the Church during the parade. ....He was glaring at me.....

name: Cain
line: Oh, so that's what was bothering you? Hey, forget about the church and enjoy the party. Look at all these sweets.

name: Riquet
line: What is this..... There's dirt on this street lamp-colored fruit......?

name: Cain
line: It's not dirt, it's chocolate. This is a chocolate-covered orange. Give it a try.

name: Riquet
line: ..... This dirt is delicious.....!

name: Cain
line: Please, it's not dirt.

name: Narrator
line: I smile as I observe everyone having fun at the party.

name: Akira
line: I'm glad everyone seems to be having a good time.

name: Snow
line: Indeed, indeed.

name: White
line: We're having fun too.

name: Figaro
line: How about you, Sir Sage? Are you enjoying yourself?

name: Akira
line: Ah, yes. But I'm not really used to this kind of thing.....

name: Figaro
line: Huh, how cute. If you're looking for a little more fun, how about a dance with me?

name: Akira
line: Huh?

name: Narrator
line: I draw back at Figaro's mischievous grin. He's a bit of a mysterious person. The Southern wizards are all modest and pure, but Figaro alone stands out: he's always composed, and he seems strangely powerful. He must know Snow, White, Arthur, and even Faust - yet he tries to keep his connections a secret. He's kind, but enigmatic. Even now, a cold light lies in the depths of his soothing, smiling eyes. I'm overwhelmed as he takes an audible step towards me.

name: Figaro
line: Don't be shy. Whether you're a man, a woman, an elderly person, a dog, or even the catastrophe itself.... I will dance with you as if I am embracing my dearest beloved. And together, we'll share a passionate dream for a fleeting moment.... Doesn't that sound just lovely? How about it? Now, please lend me your hand.

name: Narrator
line: He graciously offers me his hand, but my nerves are still buzzing. Figaro's words are seductive, and his smile, charming - I can tell that he's trying to seem harmless. But there's still something strangely terrifying about him: if I take his hand, I feel like I'm going to get swallowed whole.

name: Akira
line: Ah... No, I think I'll pass.....

name: Figaro
line: But why?

name: Akira
line: Ahaha.... I've never danced before, you see. Please feel free to invite someone else.

name: Figaro
line: But I want to dance with you.

name: Figaro
line: Because I want to make you my puppet.

name: Narrator
line: Figaro replies calmly with a smile.

name: Figaro
line: The Sage keeps the wizards in the magic headquarters together. If I want him to do my bidding - don't you think the fastest way to accomplish that would be to make him fall in love with me?

name: Akira
line: What....?

name: Figaro
line: Because when you fall in love, you can give up your heart to those you do not trust - and even to those you loathe. I'm asking you to join me in that act. ....How about it? Won't you dance with me?

name: Narrator
line: I can't believe my ears; he's saying such horrific things in such a kind, sweet voice that it makes my head spin. I stare at Figaro in shock. He's neither making a fool of me, nor is he trying to laugh at me. He just continues smiling with a kind, gentle gaze.

name: Akira
line: Is this a wizard's joke....?

name: Figaro
line: Maybe so. Why don't you see for yourself? Whether I'm a man who will hurt you, or a man sweeter than honey. Whether I'm poison or medicine.... You'll find out when you take my hand.

name: Narrator
line: His eyes, deeper than the sea, gaze into me as if soothing a child. I almost reach out in spite of myself. But then......

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro!

name: Figaro
line: Oh, Mitile. What is it?

name: Narrator
line: I snap back to my senses at Mitile's voice. Figaro seems like a completely different person again as he turns around to greet Mitile with a friendly, peaceful smile.

name: Mitile
line: Don't go wandering off on your own like that. I said I'd keep an eye on you so that you wouldn't drink too much, Dr. Figaro. Remember?

name: Figaro
line: That's right. Sorry about that.

name: Mitile
line: Were you secretly drinking lots of alcohol?

name: Figaro
line: I'm not so ill-mannered. I was just chatting with Sir Sage - isn't that right?

name: Narrator
line: Figaro winks at me facetiously. I nod absent-mindedly.

name: Akira
line: Ah... Yes....

name: Mitile
line: Geez. You were the one who said you'd drink less as your New Year's resolution, Dr. Figaro.

name: Figaro
line: I know. I won't do anything to make you worry, Mitile.

name: Mitile
line: I'll hold you to your word, okay! You really do need me to keep an eye on you, Dr. Figaro. You have to show everyone how good Southern Country is so that wizards from other countries won't make fun of us.

name: Figaro
line: Ahaha.... I'm not too good at that sort of thing, you know.

name: Mitile
line: Geez~! Try harder!

name: Narrator
line: Figaro looks like a hapless father as Mitile takes his hand and drags him away. He's a completely different person from earlier. I'm still stunned, motionless. Next to me stand the two others who were also watching him.

name: Snow
line: Scary.....

name: White
line: What was that......

name: Akira
line: Snow, White.....

name: Snow
line: I'm sorry, Sage. Figaro doesn't mean to hurt you.

name: White
line: He's just a terrible person from his very core......

name: Akira
line: Wh... What kind of person.....

name: Narrator
line: Before I can ask any further, a stir of excitement suddenly runs through the crowd.

name: Central Country man
line: It's His Royal Highness, the king's brother!

name: Central Country man
line: Lord Vincent has arrived!

name: Narrator
line: A magnificently-dressed man steps into the room, and the crowd of people bows their heads reverently. Including Arthur. Cain comes to stand next to me, whispering quietly into my ear.

name: Cain
line: That's His Royal Highness, Lord Vincent. He's the king's brother and Prince Arthur's uncle. I can't see him, but you can, right?

name: Akira
line: Yes...... There's a man who everyone is bowing their heads to. That must be him......

name: Cain
line: His Majesty was often ill, so Lord Vincent stepped in to manage the kingdom's affairs until Prince Arthur returned. He's a ruthless pragmatist, so he's tolerant towards people who show talent. But he's relentlessly harsh on those who fall behind or show the slightest hint of incompetence. Rather than rely on the vague uncertainties presented by magic, he prefers magical technology, which he can control with precision.

name: Akira
line: Magical technology?

name: Shylock
line: It's an ashen-colored technology born from Western Country, utterly lacking in any sense of beauty.

name: Narrator
line: Before I know it, Shylock has appeared at my side. He draws from his pipe as he raises an eyebrow in a rare show of irritation.

name: Shylock
line: Magical technology allows you to generate magic through scientific tools which are fueled by mana stones.

name: Akira
line: So humans can use magic too?

name: Shylock
line: Yes. Without sacrificing a thing.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock blows out smoke from his pipe like a cold sigh.

name: Shylock
line: If you attain comfort without laboring your heart or body, what kind of joy exists in that? I adore all forms of desire. But this - this is so unrefined, idle, and lacking in imagination.

name: Cain
line: You've got an interesting perspective. So you don't hate how it allows humans to use magic, but it goes against your sense of aesthetics.

name: Shylock
line: I am the master of a bar, after all.

name: Narrator
line: Shylock smiles, narrowing his eyes; his gaze settles on us like he's humouring children.

name: Shylock
line: Good wine is seductive. Likewise, temptation lies coiled like a snake inside all the pleasures this world has to offer. Such temptation ensnares the hearts of people, just as powerful magic does. And that is precisely why restraint is so beautiful. Like the agony of a holy man who must turn a deaf ear to the seductive allure of all the beauties in the world - isn't resistance in the face of pleasure the most luscious thing?

name: Cain
line: ......Leaving aside whether I agree with you or not...... When you start talking, this palace ballroom starts to feel like a nighttime lounge......

name: Shylock
line: The pleasure that arises from releasing your hold on moderation and reason does not bring about the slightest conflict. Without conflict, there is no depth. And without depth, there is no flavor. Magical technology may drive many to a drunken stupor, the same way cheap wine does, but...... One day, it will create the worst hangover that this world has yet experienced.

name: Narrator
line: A man glares intently at Shylock, seeming to have overheard his speech. Shylock pays him no attention. At that moment, Arthur approaches Mister Vincent, and they start to exchange courteous greetings.

name: Arthur
line: Uncle Vincent. Welcome; thank you for coming today.

name: Vincent
line: I see the party is as lively as it is every year. Despite the fact that the wizards failed to defeat the < Great Catastrophe > and caused us such devastating casualties this year.

name: Arthur
line: That's......

name: Vincent
line: I know; this is a festive occasion. I won't say anything further.

name: Narrator
line: Arthur bows deeply. The man standing diagonally behind Mister Vincent speaks up in his stead. It's the man who glared at Shylock earlier.

name: Nicholas
line: I belong to the Special Forces Unit of the Magical Technology Division. I am Nicholas, captain of the Magical Technology Corps.

name: Arthur
line: I know. You used to be the general of the Order of Knights, but you went on to study magical technology in Western Country; you only just returned a few months ago.

name: Nicholas
line: Pleased to make your acquaintance. Now that you have our Magical Technology Corps, there should be no foreseeable need of the Sage's wizards.

name: Narrator
line: At Mister Nicholas' words, a stir ripples through the crowd at the party. Quite a few amongst the wizards furrow their brows in displeasure.

name: Shino
line: Looks like someone's got a big mouth.

name: Heathcliff
line: Hold it, Shino.

name: Cain
line: Captain Nicholas...... He quit the Order of Knights after he lost to me, but he's been talking big ever since he got his hands on that magical technology.

name: Shylock
line: Drunks who have consumed too much cheap wine tend to boast quite loudly.

name: Narrator
line: My eyes dart anxiously back and forth between Arthur and Mister Nicholas.

name: Arthur
line: ......What are you trying to say, Nicholas?

name: Nicholas
line: Aside from Prince Arthur, the knight Cain, and the noble from Blanchett, the wizards are a bunch of rogues. We can't say for sure whether they fought the < Great Catastrophe > seriously. Did they truly try to save the world? As Lord Vincent says, it is imperative that we carry out a thorough investigation to assess the cause of this year's disastrous outcome. That is to say: did the threat of the < Great Catastrophe > actually grow stronger, or was it mere negligence on the wizards' part?

name: Arthur
line: Did you say negligence......? You're overstepping, Nicholas. Do not forget that they lost their very own comrades.

name: Nicholas
line: Well, with all due respect, Prince Arthur. We don't even know how their comrades turned into stone. For all we know, they might have had a falling out amongst themselves and caused an internal conflict.

name: Arthur
line: How preposterous...... Why would they be killing each other on the eve of the battle with the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Nicholas
line: There's no evidence to disprove the possibility. The battle between the < Great Catastrophe > and the Sage's wizards is kept a close secret, after all. Wizards who participated in the previous battle might be lauded as war heroes - but they are also war criminals who brought about immense pain and suffering.

name: Narrator
line: Nicholas' cold voice rings out across the room. What he's saying is that the wizards lost their comrades because they didn't do their jobs. Shylock re-crosses his arms, lifting an eyebrow and murmuring lightly.

name: Shylock
line: ...... Thank goodness Faust isn't here right now.

name: Murr
line: You're right! That guy would've been cursed to death!

name: Cain
line: If Prince Arthur weren't there, I'd have slugged him myself.

name: Snow
line: Oh my. The Eastern wizards, the Western wizards, and the Central wizards are all so scary......

name: White
line: That's right. Us Northern wizards are the only gentle ones around here......

name: Heathcliff
line: Please, I don't quite see how the Northern wizards could be described as gentle. You must be talking about the Southern wizards. See, like Mister Rutile......

name: Narrator
line: At that moment, the Southern wizard Rutile walks right up to Nicholas.

name: Rutile
line: What do you mean by that!?

name: Shylock
line: I'm afraid there's no such thing as a gentle wizard.

name: Murr
line: You're right! North, South, East, West, Central - we all love to fight!

name: Cain
line: I always thought the little brother seemed pretty strong-willed, but I guess that goes for the older one too.

name: Snow
line: Well, he is the son of the great witch Tiretta.

name: White
line: Tiretta was a woman with a temper. You really can't fight your bloodline.

name: Nicholas
line: You insolent fool. Give me your name.

name: Rutile
line: I am the Southern wizard, Rutile. May I ask - when you speak of these useless wizards, are you referring to the Southern wizards who died in battle, and everyone here who survived?

name: Nicholas
line: Yes, exactly. They failed to prevent the < Great Catastrophe > from drawing close, causing an unforeseen level of disastrous damage. What else could you call them but useless?

name: Rutile
line: Then what are you? You, who did not even fight the < Great Catastrophe >? I believe that would make you less than useless, would it not?

name: Narrator
line: At Rutile's words, Nicholas' imperturbable expression dissolves.

name: Nicholas
line: You insolent wizard....... You think you can get away with such arrogance simply because you can use magic? I'll show you!

name: Arthur
line: Stop it, Nicholas! The Southern wizards all died in the last battle. There were people he knew among them! You are the one who made inappropriate remarks on this celebratory occasion. You are the one who ought to apologize!

name: Nicholas
line: Prince Arthur! Do you mean to side with these wizards over me, when my military family has served the crown for generations?

name: Arthur
line: I am not siding with anyone! I am assessing the situation from an objective standpoint....

name: Vincent
line: Do not blame him, Nicholas. Arthur is still young. Of course he would side with the wizards. He must still hold a grudge towards his own mother, the Queen, for abandoning him.

name: Arthur
line: ......I bear no resentment towards Mother.

name: Vincent
line: Is that so? Then you truly are a wizard. A normal human would despise his parents if they abandoned him. As a normal human, I simply cannot understand.

name: Arthur
line: ...... Why do you refuse to listen to anything we have to say!? What is wrong with what I've said? What is wrong with what Rutile said!?

name: Nicholas
line: Please stop acting like you're the victim here: you are the ones who possess such terrifying power. What strikes fear into the people's hearts isn't just the < Great Catastrophe > - it's you wizards, too.

name: Arthur
line: We are all trying to be helpful! That goes for myself, and everyone here in this room......

name: Nicholas
line: That might be true for you, Prince Arthur, but it does not mean that the other wizards feel the same way. As we can see, neither the legendary wizard Oz nor the Northern wizards have seen fit to gather here with us today.

name: Nicholas
line: They do not care about the people suffering in this world. That is why they have turned their backs on their roles, and brought about so many casualties. I am certain that the Southern wizard who dared call me useless will likewise run away one day. We need to educate him properly before that happens. Take him away.

name: Narrator
line: (Rustle)

name: Arthur
line: Stop it, Nicholas......!

name: Mitile
line: Nii-sama......! What should we do, Dr. Figaro.......

name: Figaro
line: Oh boy...... Don't kill them, Lennox.

name: Lennox
line: I'm not you.

name: Snow
line: This won't do! You mustn't lay a finger on the humans!

name: White
line: We'll end up fighting the humans before we fight the < Great Catastrophe >!

name: Narrator
line: At that moment......

name: Narrator
line: (Thunder)

name: Narrator
line: A resounding crash of thunder reverberates throughout the room.

name: Narrator
line: In an instant, the cloudless blue sky is engulfed by dark, rolling clouds. Even though the wind is still, the lights in the room go out, plunging the animated ballroom into a grey, ominous darkness.

name: Central Country man
line: What in the world......!?

name: Central Country man
line: It can't be...... Did the < Great Catastrophe > approach again......

name: Vincent
line: ......Impossible......

name: Narrator
line: The windows rattle violently, and everyone holds their breath at the unsettling atmosphere. A strained silence hangs oppressively in the air, marking the unexpected turn of the night. Suddenly, a man's low voice rings out.
<< Arthim >>

name: Central Country man
line: Was that a magic spell......!?

name: Snow
line: ......That voice just now......

name: White
line: Could it be Mithra......!?

name: Akira
line: Mithra......!?

name: Narrator
line: At that name, I recall what the sage's manual says about Mithra. "Mithra. Maximum warning." "Don't be fooled by his looks and his polite speech." "He's a beast. He'll kill you." And then...... Bang! The ground starts to shake.

name: Narrator
line: (Rumbling)

name: Rustica
line: Oh no. Are you all right, my lady?

name: Drummond
line: M-Mithra of the North......! He's savage and brutal, and his magical power is second only to Oz's......! C-could he have heard us just now - is he coming for us in a fit of anger?

name: Nicholas
line: Th-that can't be......

name: Narrator
line: (Thud)

name: Vincent
line: ......Secure the castle perimeters!

name: Central Country nobleman
line: Eek......! The Northern wizards are going to kill us all......!

name: Snow
line: Shylock, Murr. If Mithra starts a rampage, do you think you could stop him?

name: Shylock
line: Of course not.

name: Murr
line: No way.

name: White
line: Thank you for your immediate response.

name: Shylock & Murr
line: You're welcome.

name: Cain
line: Should we get Faust? But I guess he might just side with Mithra....

name: Figaro
line: No, he's actually quite a softie, so I don't think he'll harm any innocent civilians....

name: Shino
line: Sounds like fun. I'll take him on.

name: Heathcliff
line: Don't be an idiot! Stand back!

name: Shino
line: Did you just call me an idiot?

name: Heathcliff
line: ....You can only be so bold because you don't actually know Mithra.....

name: Heathcliff
line: ....What should we do.... Sir Oz is the only one who can defeat him......

name: Rutile
line: ....Mithra....? Could he be.... Uncle Mithra....?

name: Arthur
line: Uncle, watch out! Behind you!

name: Narrator
line: At Arthur's voice, everyone turns to look behind Vincent. A giant, glowing door mysteriously materializes into the space where there had only been a wall.

name: Narrator
line: (Creak)

name: Narrator
line: The door swings open, pale light spilling from the cracks.

name: Arthur
line: This is.......

name: Narrator
line: Arthur moves to shield Mister Vincent, narrowing his eyes against the bright light emanating from the door. Something blows into the room through the open door. - It's a blizzard.

name: Narrator
line: When my eyes grow used to the brightness, I see him.

name: Narrator
line: A young man, leaning wordlessly against the door, silvery flakes of fine snow falling onto his shoulders. Exuding an air of striking sensuality, he is too handsome a man to call a beast.

name: Mithra
line: Hello. I'm the Northern wizard, Mithra. Though I suppose I am an uninvited guest. Excuse me.

name: Narrator
line: With an easy languor to his movements, he pushes his tall, slender figure off the doorframe and walks forward. Snow, White, Shylock, and even Figaro look nervous. And then the looks on their faces turn to despair. Because Mithra isn't the only figure to emerge from the door.

name: White
line: So you came too.....

name: Narrator
line: The young man, as lifeless as a corpse, smiles faintly. The moment I set my eyes on him, my skin prickles with goosebumps. The depths of his smiling eyes hold no trace of human emotion. They emit only a cold, terrifying light. But I am familiar with the colors of his eyes.

name: Owen
line: How rude. Is nobody going to welcome me? I'm the Northern wizard Owen. Nice to meet you.

name: Narrator
line: Owen's footsteps echo quietly as he cuts his way across the room. Everyone stares at their feet in cold despair; nobody wants to make eye contact with him. With the exception of one person.

name: Cain
line: Owen....!

name: Owen
line: ...Oh my, Sir Knight. It suits you quite well - my eyeball, that is.

name: Akira
line: (That's right....) (Owen is the one who stole Cain's eye.....)

name: Cain
line: So you're the only person I can see..... This is some cruel irony.

name: Owen
line: Fufu... What are you talking about?

name: Narrator
line: Owen smiles sardonically, turning to look back at the door. The person who steps out next is someone I've met before.

name: Bradley
line: Tch.... Northern wizard, Bradley.

name: Narrator
line: It's Bradley, who suddenly disappeared the other night. Someone told me that he was a prisoner.

name: Bradley
line: Just when I thought I could finally kick back and get away from it all... I had to get dragged back into this fucking mess.

name: Narrator
line: Bradley brushes the snow off himself and strides forward into the room. At the sight of Bradley's figure, one person stands rooted to the spot in bewilderment.

name: Bradley
line: Hey, Nero. It sure has been a while. Did you have fun going clean and washing your hands of the bandit gang while I was stuck in jail?

name: Riquet
line: .......Bandit gang......?

name: Nero
line: ......This has nothing to do with you.

name: Bradley
line: Ahaha! That crest! So you were chosen too, Nero!

name: Narrator
line: The sudden arrival of the three Northern wizards... Sinks the atmosphere of the magnificent ballroom into terror and despair. A clear demonstration of the overwhelming power they wield. Mithra. Owen. Bradley. If they put their minds to it, they could easily take this castle for themselves. Even Mister Vincent doesn't dare move a muscle. Yet they show no signs of attacking. They simply turn towards the strange door behind them, looking annoyed. As if waiting for someone.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Narrator
line: The last person to step out of the door is......

name: Narrator
line: -Oz, holding his mysterious staff in one hand. The strange door waits for Oz to cross its threshold before easing shut with a solemn thud. Then it vanishes, as if a mere illusion, leaving behind only a light dusting of snow. Everyone stares at Oz in sheer disbelief. Oz doesn't say anything.

name: Akira
line: (Oz...... Did he.......) (Did he hear us out......?) (That's why he forced the Northern wizards into submission and brought them here......)

name: Oz
line: I'm the Central wizard, Oz. Now all of the Sage's wizards have assembled. Younger brother of the King of Central. If you are still dissatisfied, speak your mind now.

name: Narrator
line: Faced with Oz's glare, Mister Vincent looks away, like he's trying to escape.

name: Vincent
line: ......I extend a sincere welcome.

name: Narrator
line: Everyone in the ballroom breathes a sigh of relief at the reply bitterly wrung out of Mister Vincent's throat. Murr smiles and raises his glass.

name: Murr
line: Alright then, let the party go on!

name: Narrator
line: The cheering continues, and the party vigorously swings back to life.

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Narrator
line: Arthur runs up to Oz's side, a smile stretched over his face.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz! Thank you very much!

name: Narrator
line: He looks at Arthur without saying a word and then curtly averts his eyes.

name: Oz
line: There is no reason for you to thank me.

name: Arthur
line: ...Ah.... Yes, I am aware. But you made everyone so happy.

name: Narrator
line: Oz says, looking at me.

name: Oz
line: I've fulfilled my duty.

name: Narrator
line: And then, just like that- For the first time, all of the wizards of the magic headquarters have gathered together.

name: Narrator
line: Some tension still lingers in the air, but everyone seems to be enjoying the party. I observe Mithra. His tall, slender figure makes for an attractive sight; his cool gaze would probably cause riots amongst girls.

name: Akira
line: (He has such a polite manner that I can't really see what makes him a "beast," but......)

name: Narrator
line: Just as the thought enters my mind, Mithra reaches forward with long fingers that look like they belong to an artist, and grabs a piece of meat.

name: Narrator
line: And then he bites into it, gnawing and tearing off huge chunks. Mithra chews away without sparing a thought for his handsome face, his fingers and lips sticky with grease.

name: Akira
line: (......He has such a pretty face, but......)

name: Snow
line: Glad you came, Mithra. I was worried that the gates of hell would burst open.

name: Mithra
line: Oz dragged me here by force......

name: Narrator
line: Mithra showcases his lack of manners by licking his fingers and narrowing his eyes in resentment. His behavior is vulgar and wild, but there is a languid attractiveness to him.

name: Mithra
line: I really will kill him one day.

name: White
line: Now, now. Thanks to him, you get to eat this delicious food.

name: Mithra
line: It's all the same once it ends up in your stomach.

name: Snow
line: Oh, that's right. Let me introduce the sage.

name: Narrator
line: I wince when Snow and White direct the conversation to me. Mithra looks over at me nonchalantly.

name: Akira
line: Ah...... I'm the Sage, Akira. Nice to meet you.

name: Mithra
line: Yeah. Hello......

name: Narrator
line: Mithra greets me offhandedly, then suddenly brings his face close to mine. He sniffs around the nape of my neck, and steps back like nothing happened.

name: Mithra
line: I see.....

name: Akira
line: (W-what was that.......!?)

name: Mithra
line: By the way, why was I called here? Are you sure I don't have to defeat anything or kill anyone?

name: Snow
line: You certainly are hot-blooded. The Sage will assign you a role - try asking him.

name: Akira
line: Eh!?

name: Narrator
line: I flounder as the topic swings back to me. Mithra sinks his teeth into the meat, tilting his head to one side.

name: Mithra
line: What should I do?

name: Mithra
line: What should I do?

name: Akira
line: Um... For today, please have an enjoyable night with the other wizards and the people of Central.

name: Mithra
line: ...... That's it?

name: Akira
line: Th...... That's it.

name: Narrator
line: Mithra gazes at me for a moment, then breaks into an amused smile.

name: Mithra
line: Ahaha.

name: Narrator
line: He smiles, as carefree as a child. I'm mesmerized by this unexpected expression. Mithra shakes his head cheerfully.

name: Mithra
line: Oh, most certainly. Oz should have just said that from the start.

name: Akira
line: Wh...... What did Oz tell you?

name: Mithra
line: He said, "Obey me." Naturally, we ended up trying to kill each other. He really infuriates me.

name: Narrator
line: Mithra lifts a hand, still sticky with grease, to sweep his long fringe aside. I reflexively grab a napkin and stuff it into his hand. Mithra blinks at me with a confused look on his face.

name: Akira
line: Um, you'll get grease in your hair if you do that, so I think you should wipe your hands first.

name: Mithra
line: What's wrong with that?

name: Akira
line: I... I mean, if you're okay with it...

name: Mithra
line: Okay... I'll try using it, then.

name: Narrator
line: Mithra wipes his fingers with the napkin, still looking slightly mystified. When I point to his lips, he uses the napkin to wipe his mouth as well. For some reason, the twins look deeply moved.

name: Snow
line: I never thought I would witness Mithra wiping his mouth with a napkin....

name: White
line: You really do live to see all sorts of wonders....

name: Narrator
line: Mithra looks like he'd be suited for an elegant dinner at a high-class restaurant, yet he's incredibly informal when it comes to a lot of things. As soon as he wipes his hands, he grabs an ornamental apple and bites into it.

name: Mithra
line: Well then, I'll take a walk around. I just have to be nice to the people who speak to me, right?

name: Snow
line: I don't think anyone will try to speak to you... You should try speaking to them instead.

name: Mithra
line: Okay...... What should I say?

name: White
line: You could say, "Hello"?

name: Snow
line: Or something like, "It's lovely weather"?

name: Narrator
line: Mithra laughs wryly with a shake of his shoulders.

name: Mithra
line: I understand. Humans certainly take it into their minds to do foolish things.

name: Snow
line: Don't kill them.

name: White
line: You must not kill them.

name: Mithra
line: Well, I'll try my best.

name: Narrator
line: Mithra strolls off, and the twins watch his back before turning to me.

name: Snow
line: We're a little worried, so we'll go follow him.

name: White
line: Sage, take your time and enjoy yourself too.

name: Akira
line: Yes, I understand.

name: Narrator
line: I nod, seeing them off. I feel a brief sense of relief; I was terrified of Mithra, but I managed to speak to him normally. At this rate, maybe I can have a conversation with Owen, too. With that thought in mind, I look around the room. My eyes land on Owen immediately. -He, too, is looking right at me. With a smile on his face.

name: Narrator
line: The next moment, I find myself on the balcony.

name: Owen
line: Hey.

name: Akira
line: Owen...... We were inside just a moment ago.....

name: Owen
line: I called you here.

name: Akira
line: You did....?

name: Owen
line: I have no friends, so I wanted you to speak to me. Sir Sage.

name: Narrator
line: I gaze at Owen incredulously, because I've heard so many scary rumours about him. Owen smiles sadly.

name: Owen
line: That look on your face... It's fine. I'm used to it. Was I a bother? I'll send you back inside.

name: Akira
line: Ah... I'm sorry. I didn't mean to.....

name: Narrator
line: I'm taken aback by how lonely Owen looks. But now that I think about it - all my knowledge of him comes from rumors. I don't know the real Owen.

name: Akira
line: Let's talk, Owen. I wanted to speak with you too.

name: Owen
line: Talk about what?

name: Akira
line: Um.... I'd love to know what kind of person you are, Owen. We will probably be seeing a lot of each other from here on out, so I want to get along....

name: Owen
line: Ahaha.....

name: Narrator
line: Owen smiles faintly. The setting sun burns behind him. Beautifully ominous purple clouds drift across the sky.

name: Owen
line: I want to talk about myself too. But I don't know much about myself.

name: Owen
line: But I do know about you - you, the Sage who is all alone.

name: Narrator
line: His eyes - the same color as Cain's - glint with amusement. And as I stare into those eyes, I'm overcome by a sudden surge of loneliness.

name: Owen
line: Want me to tell you?

name: Akira
line: About what....?

name: Owen
line: About yourself. What people think of you. What will make people laugh at you. What will make people loathe you. What will make people praise you. Did the parade make you feel good? Did the party make you happy? Those are mere tricks made to fool children. The wizards and the people you met in this world - they don't actually care about you at all. If you act like a sage, they're willing to speak to you, but the moment you forget your duty, they will shower you with criticism. Because nobody has business with you unless you're the Sage - and you must feel the same way too.

name: Akira
line: ...What are you saying...?

name: Owen
line: When you think about yourself, don't you get extremely.... Anxious? Don't you feel so lonely?

name: Narrator
line: I take a step back, suddenly terrified. Owen steps closer, still smiling.

name: Owen
line: Why are you running away? I'm talking about you. Do you hate yourself so much that you want to run away? Is your true self someone you'd rather avert your eyes from?

name: Narrator
line: The glow of the red and purple sunset blurs in the light. Owen laughs, narrowing his eyes of different colors. As I stagger, he offers me a hand.

name: Owen
line: Hey.... Let's talk about you. Come on, don't run away. Pity me; don't abandon me. Please guide me, Sir Sage.

name: Oz
line: -Owen.

name: Narrator
line: That's when I realize that Oz has appeared on the balcony with us. Owen purses his lips as if he's lost interest.

name: Owen
line: What is it? Can't you see we're busy talking?

name: Oz
line: Stay away from the Sage.

name: Oz
line: Stay away from the Sage.

name: Owen
line: Oh? But you were the one who brought me here?

name: Narrator
line: Oz replies, unmoved by Owen's sneering.

name: Oz
line: I did.

name: Narrator
line: Owen glares sulkily at Oz. And then he slides away from me. As his form begins to vanish like smoke, he flashes a wicked smile at Oz.

name: Owen
line: No use pretending you're a good boy, Oz. I know who you really are - you're the king of demons, scarier than the < Great Catastrophe > itself.

name: Oz
line: Do you want me to kill you again, Owen?

name: Owen
line: Fufu...... Ahaha......

name: Narrator
line: Owen disappears, leaving behind only his laughter.

name: Oz
line: Do not worry. He's probably somewhere near.

name: Narrator
line: I let out a sigh of relief. I was afraid I'd chased him off after Oz went through the trouble of bringing him here. The evening breeze sends lavender clouds drifting across the sky.

name: Akira
line: ......What did you mean when you said, "want me to kill you again"......?

name: Oz
line: Owen has hidden his soul. That is why, no matter how many times he dies, he will always come back to life. What did you talk about with Owen?

name: Akira
line: ......Nothing much......

name: Oz
line: Do not listen to Owen's words. They will eat away at your soul.

name: Oz
line: Did he curse you?

name: Akira
line: No...... He simply asked me about myself.

name: Oz
line: That is the curse. To speak of yourself to someone you have not opened your heart to - anyone would find that a painful burden to bear.

name: Narrator
line: I feel a sense of relief at Oz's words. Because when I was talking to Owen, some part of me couldn't resist the uncertainty, hopelessness, and guilt.

name: Narrator
line: Oz looks at me intently, like he has something to say. After a while, he turns his gaze towards the twilight sky.

name: Oz
line: What is your name?

name: Akira
line: Ah...... My name is Akira.

name: Oz
line: Akira.

name: Narrator
line: Oz says my name carefully.

name: Oz
line: Do not forget your name. The greater your duty, the more easily you come to forget your name. The king, the doctor, the knight, the mother, the child. The Sage. The Northern wizards. Crushed by the weight of the titles forced upon them, they cease to be beings with names, and lose their true selves. I, too, have already forgotten the previous sage's name....

name: Oz
line: But you still have your own name. Do not forget it, and do not let anyone else forget it.

name: Narrator
line: I feel the weight carried in those words. I nod solemnly, and ask Oz.

name: Akira
line: ......Are you also thinking about Arthur, who is a wizard, and the Prince of Central?

name: Narrator
line: Oz looks stunned. He seems terribly irritated, but he also looks slightly embarrassed.

name: Oz
line: .....What are you talking about?

name: Akira
line: You were the one who raised Arthur, right?

name: Oz
line: Don't be foolish.

name: Narrator
line: Oz abruptly turns his face to the side.

name: Oz
line: That child possessed powerful magic. I simply picked him up to gather his stone.

name: Akira
line: Really....?

name: Oz
line: That's right. And now he has returned to his parents. ......That is all there is to it.

name: Oz
line: Do not concern yourself with others. Take care that you do not forget my warning. If you get tired of being the Sage, you may cast aside your role. Even if you do, you will still be yourself. Do not blindly follow your role. For even if you try to abandon it, it will still follow you. Do not let trivial curses sway your heart.

name: Narrator
line: Though Oz speaks with a strict tone, I can tell it's his way of encouraging and comforting me. I laugh and nod.

name: Akira
line: I understand, Oz. Thank you.

name: Narrator
line: Oz furrows his brows, turning his face away; he says the same thing he said to Arthur earlier.

name: Oz
line: There is no reason for you to thank me.

name: Narrator
line: He looks scary, but I think Oz must be a kind person. He reminds me of the boss of the neighborhood cats, who was proud and splendid, with chubby legs. He never got attached to humans, but he was always kind to the mother cats and their kittens. I suppress my laughter at the image, and Oz looks at me with a puzzled face.

name: Oz
line: What is it......?

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens)

name: Vincent
line: Sir Sage, Oz. So this is where you were.

name: Akira
line: You're Arthur's uncle......

name: Vincent
line: I apologize for Nicholas' behavior earlier. I have a favor I'd like to ask of you two.

name: Akira
line: A favor......?

name: Vincent
line: Look to the north. There's a collapsed tower.

name: Akira
line: Ah....... That's the huge tower I saw when I arrived in this world......

name: Vincent
line: The tower is a symbol of Central Country, but it collapsed in an earthquake this morning.

name: Akira
line: There was an earthquake?

name: Vincent
line: It seems to have been a highly localized earthquake. There were no other damages, except for the tower and the gate nearby, which has been all but destroyed. Under normal circumstances, we would repair it ourselves. But the people fear that it is a harbinger of further misfortune to come. Could you repair it with magic? I'm sure it would go a long way towards reassuring the people if they could witness such an incredible feat with their own eyes. I've tried asking Arthur, but it proved to be beyond him. But I'm sure it's perfectly possible for one such as the legendary wizard Oz.

name: Narrator
line: Oz doesn't say anything. Perhaps he's displeased by Vincent's high-handed way of speaking. But if he can restore such an important symbol, surely it would improve the reputation of wizards in the people's eyes. I tentatively observe Oz's expression.

name: Akira
line: Oz...... I'm asking this of you as well. Could you please repair the tower?

name: Oz
line: .......If that is your wish, Sage.

name: Vincent
line: You have my thanks. Well then, I'll show you to the tower tomorrow......

name: Oz
line: I can do it from here.

name: Narrator
line: Oz murmurs with exasperation, his staff already in hand.

name: Vincent
line: Right here...? You mean you're going to repair it right now...?

name: Oz
line: Do you have any objections?

name: Narrator
line: Without my realizing, the sky has turned a deep shade of cerulean blue. The outline of the < Great Catastrophe > is faintly visible in the sky. I suddenly recall the bizarre injuries that the < Great Catastrophe > inflicted on the wizards. Snow and White turn into a portrait at nightfall, and Cain cannot see anyone until he touches them. Shylock's heart will suddenly burst into flames. Have Oz and the Northern wizards also been inflicted with injuries from the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Narrator
line: (Footsteps)

name: Mithra
line: What are you doing?

name: Akira
line: Mithra....

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz... Sir Oz, are you going to repair the Central tower for us?

name: Akira
line: And Arthur...... Yes, that's right.

name: Mithra
line: Interesting. Let me watch.

name: Oz
line: Do not speak with food in your mouth.

name: Mithra
line: This thing is really hard, you know?

name: Arthur
line: Mithra. You don't have to eat the shells. Please spit them out.

name: Mithra
line: Why? Do you want them? If you do, then it makes me want to eat them all the more.

name: Arthur
line: Is that so......? I hope scallop shells aren't bad for your teeth......

name: Mithra
line: They're tasting more and more like biscuits.

name: Oz
line: Silence, both of you.

name: Arthur
line: S-sorry!

name: Mithra
line: Wahhh, wahhhhh, waaaaaaaaah.

name: Narrator
line: Arthur shrinks back at Oz's reproach, while Mithra lets loose a stream of taunting jeers. Taking a deep breath, Oz raises his staff towards the sky. And solemnly recites his spell.

name: Narrator
line: But before he can get to the end of his spell, Oz's eyelids slowly close, and...... His entire body leans over onto me. The next moment, Oz has fallen asleep.

name: Akira
line: O-Oz!?

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz!?

name: Akira
line: P-please don't fall asleep! Plea...... He's really heavy!

name: Mithra
line: What is he doing?

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz, Sir Oz! Please pull yourself together!

name: Narrator
line: Arthur shakes Oz's body, and Oz opens his eyes. He gazes at Arthur before surveying the area around him.

name: Oz
line: Where am I...... Right, the Central castle. I was asked to repair the Central tower. By that youth who was all bark and didn't wish to lift a finger himself.

name: Vincent
line: .......Are you talking about me?

name: Oz
line: I didn't realize you were here. No matter. << Vox...... >> Zz.......

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz....!

name: Akira
line: Oz......! Don't fall asleep......!

name: Mithra
line: Ahahaha! I'll push him off the balcony while I can!

name: Arthur
line: Don't be so rude! Sir Oz, Sir Oz! Are you all right?

name: Oz
line: ...... Where am I..... Right, the Central castle. I was asked to repair the Central tower.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz, you said that just......

name: Oz
line: Well, no matter. I'll get this done in a second. << Vox...... >> Zz.......

name: Mithra
line: Ahahaha! This is the third time!

name: Arthur
line: ......Don't laugh at Sir Oz! There must be a reason for this!

name: Akira
line: It might be his injury from the < Great Catastrophe >! Everyone who fought the < Great Catastrophe > is suffering from a bizarre injury. Mithra, are you all right?

name: Mithra
line: ......Because of the < Great Catastrophe >......?

name: Oz
line: ...... Where am I.....

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz...... This is the Central castle. You were asked to repair the Central tower with magic, but...... Because of the < Great Catastrophe >, it looks like you fall asleep every time you try to use magic.

name: Oz
line: ......... .......Don't be ridiculous...... That cannot be. I was able to use magic against Mithra and Owen.

name: Mithra
line: That's right. You nearly killed me.

name: Arthur
line: Then, why......

name: Owen
line: Maybe he can't use it at night?

name: Akira
line: Owen......

name: Oz
line: Owen, what is that portrait you're carrying? ...... Is that Snow and White......?

name: Owen
line: These two got trapped inside a frame the moment the sun went down.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Owen, be a good boy.

name: White in the portrait
line: You must treat us with care.

name: Owen
line: Can I throw you off the balcony to see if you can fly while you're stuck in the frame?

name: Snow & White in the portrait
line: No no no no no no no!

name: Owen
line: There we go~.

name: Narrator
line: (Whistling sound through the air)

name: Snow & White in the portrait
line: Eeeeeeeeek~!

name: Arthur
line: Sir Snow! Sir White!

name: Narrator
line: Owen tosses the portrait of Snow and White from the balcony.

name: Akira
line: W-will they be all right!?

name: Oz
line: I can sense their magic. They should be fine.

name: Owen
line: Mithra.

name: Mithra
line: What is it?

name: Owen
line: You should cast away Oz just like that.

name: Narrator
line: Mithra blinks repeatedly, looking at Oz's bitter expression.

name: Owen
line: You can beat Oz for sure right now. If you kill him, you won't have to obey him anymore.

name: Mithra
line: That's true.

name: Oz
line: Mithra......

name: Mithra
line: There's no way I could lose to you if you can't use magic. I never thought the < Great Catastrophe > would leave me such a blessing......

name: Mithra
line: Oz. I'm going to pay you back for all these years.

name: Akira
line: Mithra! Wait......

name: Arthur
line: Wait!

name: Narrator
line: In a moment, Arthur steps out in front of Oz, both arms spread wide as if he's protecting him. Oz's eyes widen.

name: Arthur
line: I won't let you lay a finger on Sir Oz. If you intend to fight, I will be your opponent.

name: Oz
line: Move, Arthur!

name: Arthur
line: I refuse!

name: Oz
line: You do not stand a chance against him!

name: Arthur
line: Even so!

name: Arthur
line: I...... I will protect you, Sir Oz. Just as you protected me from avalanches and wolves when I was little! I will definitely protect you!

name: Mithra
line: Interesting. I'll be your opponent.

name: Oz
line: Stop, Mithra!

name: Akira
line: Arthur, Mithra....!

name: Narrator
line: Mithra prowls closer towards Arthur, who is still protecting Oz behind his back. A red-and-black light dances in the palm of Mithra's right hand, and panic flashes across Oz's face. I reach out to grab Mithra's hand.

name: Mithra
line: Hey, that's dangerous.

name: Akira
line: Mithra, please wait! If we lose any of the chosen wizards, we might not be able to defeat the < Great Catastrophe >! Then the world might really come to an end!

name: Mithra
line: ......You have a point.

name: Narrator
line: Owen purses his lips in discontent.

name: Owen
line: You're so easy.

name: Mithra
line: But wouldn't it be a problem for you too, Owen? If the world ends, then we die too.

name: Owen
line: Well, true..... Okay, but it's still a good opportunity, so why don't you take an arm or a leg?

name: Mithra
line: I don't make a hobby of collecting body parts like you do.

name: Owen
line: I don't either. I just happened to like this eye. But I'd want Oz's arm.

name: Arthur
line: What are you going to do with Sir Oz's arm!?

name: Owen
line: I'll use it to scratch my back.

name: Mithra
line: That sounds convenient.

name: Owen
line: And I'll make it pet my head.

name: Arthur
line: You should just ask him right now! Sir Oz will pat your head. He did many times when I was little......

name: Oz
line: Arthur...... Arthur. That's enough. Keep quiet.

name: Arthur
line: But Sir Oz......

name: Narrator
line: Oz mutters his spell in a low voice. When he does, a new figure appears on the scene. It's Figaro, a Southern wizard.

name: Figaro
line: Huh? Oz, did you call me?

name: Oz
line: ......Yaaawn...... It looks like I can manage simple magic.... But I am...... sleepy.....

name: Figaro
line: Hey now, don't call someone over just to yawn in their face.

name: Narrator
line: Everyone is terrified of Oz, but Figaro lectures him so frankly. He also shows no sign of surprise at being summoned out of nowhere. Oz continues.

name: Oz
line: I've temporarily lost my magic. Protect Arthur from Mithra and Owen. You can handle them, right, Figaro?

name: Akira
line: ...."You can handle them, right, Figaro"....? Weren't the Southern wizards supposed to be weak....?

name: Oz
line: Figaro is a Northern wizard. He's lived longer than me.

name: Narrator
line: I stare at Figaro in amazement. But I am the only one here who is surprised. It seems like Arthur, Mithra, and Owen already know of this.

name: Figaro
line: Hey, can you.....

name: Narrator
line: Figaro grumbles at Oz.

name: Figaro
line: Can you stop getting in the way of my laid-back lifestyle all the time?

name: Oz
line: Laid-back lifestyle?

name: Figaro
line: I'm talking about my peaceful, quiet life. That's how the previous sage described it. Listen, Oz. I want to be a good, average citizen. In Southern Country, I'm just a simple old guy with a naughty streak.

name: Oz
line: An old guy with a naughty streak?

name: Figaro
line: Rutile and Mitile don't know of my past. They tell me, "Dr. Figaro, you're no good at anything." Isn't that lovely?

name: Arthur
line: But Sir Figaro, you're good at everything!

name: Figaro
line: Thanks, Arthur. You're as cute as always. Even though you were raised by such an obstinate guy.

name: Narrator
line: Figaro pats Arthur on the head, and then turns around to look at me ruefully.

name: Figaro
line: Man, Sir Sage found out too. I tried to come onto him like a simple, helpless young man....

name: Oz
line: You came onto the Sage.....

name: Arthur
line: You came onto Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: Um, you didn't seem simple or helpless at all..... You were pretty overwhelming, and I was honestly scared.....

name: Figaro
line: No way? Looks like I need to study harder. I wasn't trying to scare you - sorry.

name: Narrator
line: Figaro apologizes without a trace of remorse and faces Mithra and Owen. He rolls up his sleeves like a doctor about to inspect his patients.

name: Figaro
line: Anyway, this had better be the last time you ask me to do this sort of thing. ...You want me to handle Mithra and Owen, right?

name: Mithra
line: Oh, I don't like this man at all.

name: Figaro
line: And I don't want to do this either. You and Owen are both so strong, and I'm getting pretty old.....

name: Arthur
line: But Sir Figaro, you're always so youthful!

name: Figaro
line: Thank you, Arthur. I guess Sir Figaro will do his best for you, then.

name: Narrator
line: The corners of Figaro's mouth lift into a bold smirk. Mithra, too, is charged with murderous intent. And then.....

name: Narrator
line: (Door opens) (Footsteps)

name: Mitile
line: Dr. Figaro~.

name: Rutile
line: Dr. Figaro~, are you around?

name: Narrator
line: Figaro's movements pause at the appearance of the Southern brothers. Abruptly, he turns around cheerfully, all the tension gone from his voice.

name: Figaro
line: Ye~s, what is it~?

name: Mitile
line: The cake is here!

name: Rutile
line: It's full of chestnuts - your favorite! Let's eat together.

name: Figaro
line: Oh yay~! I'll totally have some!

name: Oz
line: ......Do you ever question your way of life?

name: Figaro
line: Shut up. ....Anyway, looks like I can't help you. Sorry.

name: Oz
line: ....You're going to leave me for chestnuts?

name: Figaro
line: I can steal chestnuts from a merchant at any time. I'm leaving for them, because I want to reciprocate their sincerity with equal goodness. I'm a kind man, after all. And you should try to get along with Mithra too. Share a cake or two. Love and friendship are wonderful things, you know.

name: Rutile
line: Dr. Figaro, were you still speaking to Sir Sage and the others?

name: Figaro
line: Oh, no worries. We're all done-.

name: Rutile
line: Would everyone else like some cake too? I'll bring you slices if you'd like.

name: Akira
line: Ah, no, we.....

name: Owen
line: There's cake?

name: Akira
line: Woah....! You surprised me, suddenly appearing behind my back......

name: Owen
line: Maybe I'll have some.

name: Rutile
line: Then I'll bring you some. How about you, Sir Oz, Prince Arthur, and Mister Mithra?

name: Oz
line: I'm fine.

name: Arthur
line: No, thank you.

name: Mithra
line: I'll eat anything but scallop shells.

name: Arthur
line: See? They weren't good after all.

name: Mithra
line: But I ate something with a similar shape once - it was soft and sweet and delicious. Perhaps the flavor changes with the harvesting season.

name: Arthur
line: Ah, that must've been a madeline. I'll ask the maids to bring you some.

name: Owen
line: I'll eat lots of cakes. Can you pile them up onto a big plate?

name: Rutile
line: Got it. I see you really like sweets.

name: Owen
line: Yup.

name: Mitile
line: What's your favorite kind of cake? I'll bring it to you if they have it.

name: Owen
line: It's made of utterly crushed up red fruits, loaded with piles of sugar, and simmered down until it's like an open wound that's just recovering.

name: Rutile
line: Maybe he's talking about jam?

name: Mitile
line: Huh. Oh, I see it now. I'll bring you some.

name: Owen
line: I like cream too. The slimy, fluffy stuff that sticks all over your hands. I'd compare it to....

name: Mitile
line: Y-you don't have to compare it to anything. I'm good.

name: Owen
line: I want to stuff my mouth completely full with it. So it'll spill out of the corners of my lips when I close them.

name: Mitile
line: I see..... ...Yeah, the Northern wizards are kind of scary..... I don't think we'll get along.....

name: Rutile
line: Don't say that. Plus.....

name: Mitile
line: Plus what....? What are you looking at - Mister Mithra?

name: Rutile
line: ....He might be Mother's friend.... I'll ask him later. Well then, see you in a bit, everyone.

name: Figaro
line: Thanks, Rutile, Mitile.

name: Owen
line: There's going to be cake.

name: Narrator
line: Owen looks highly pleased, and even Mithra seems to have lost his will to fight.

name: Mithra
line: It's warm here, even at night. Good thing I didn't bring a jacket.

name: Owen
line: I like the stuff that's drenched in sweet rum, too. Wonder what that's called.

name: Narrator
line: I look at the two of them contemplatively.

name: Akira
line: (These two....... They're scary, but they can also be really easygoing......) (Huh......?) (Is that Nero under the balcony? Is he with someone.....?) (Or am I just imagining things......?)

name: Bradley
line: Tch... I finally got my hands on some good food. Don't get in my way like that. Why'd you drag me out here, Nero?

name: Nero
line: Don't give me that shit. I heard rumors about you becoming a Sage's wizard, but when did they let you out? I thought you were supposed to be locked up unless you were fighting the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Bradley
line: Well, I am. Even when they let me out of prison, Snow and White wouldn't take their eyes off me in the magical headquarters; I never got a chance to escape. But I managed to break free the other day by chance.

name: Nero
line: How.

name: Bradley
line: I sneezed and got blasted far away.

name: Nero
line: ......You sneezed?

name: Bradley
line: Yeah.

name: Nero
line: Like, ah-choo?

name: Bradley
line: Yeah.

name: Nero
line: ............. Hey, stop fucking around.

name: Bradley
line: Listen, it sounds stupid as hell, but it's true! Every time I sneeze, I get blasted away.

name: Nero
line: Seriously? What are you gonna do when you catch a cold?

name: Bradley
line: Well, I guess I'd be stuck taking a tour around the world. Tch.... What the hell's going on.....? And I ended up getting dragged back by Oz anyway.

name: Nero
line: A sneeze, huh....

name: Bradley
line: How about you, Nero? Our gang fell apart before I knew it. I thought you'd keep the guys together.

name: Nero
line: I went clean. I won't tag along with your bullshit jobs.

name: Bradley
line: Hey, don't be like that. Let's work together again. We'll get outta here and stir up a real storm.

name: Nero
line: I'm making an honest living now. Don't drag me into this.

name: Bradley
line: An honest living? What are you doing?

name: Nero
line: ......I run a restaurant in the East.

name: Bradley
line: You're running a restaurant? Ahahaha!

name: Bradley
line: .......Well, I guess that's not a bad idea... Your food was real good, after all. I see.... That's disappointing, but I guess that's how it is. Cook meals, watch horses, do whatever you want.

name: Bradley
line: What do you mean?

name: Nero
line: You said you'd kill me if I left the gang.

name: Bradley
line: What's the point in killing a restaurant owner? Plus, I got caught, and now they've even got me working as a Sage's wizard.

name: Bradley
line: But there is one thing I want to ask you.

name: Nero
line: .....What?

name: Bradley
line: Where were you on the night I was captured? If you had been there, I never would've been caught.

name: Bradley
line: I'm not here to blame you or anything. But I always wanted to know what happened to you. Spit it out, Nero.

name: Bradley
line: Ahaha! Hey, what's wrong? Don't look so serious! It's not like I got caught because of you. I just wanna hear the truth.

name: Snow & White in the portrait
line: Eeeeeeeeee!

name: Narrator
line: (Thump)

name: Bradley
line: ......!? Ow......!? This thing came crashing down on my head!

name: Nero
line: Snow, White......?

name: White in the portrait
line: We didn't want to come crashing down on your head either!

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Owen threw us off the balcony! Go complain to Owen instead!

name: Bradley
line: Tch...... That guy's creepy as hell. I'm gonna kill him one day.....

name: Nero
line: Right, you guys get stuck in this frame because of your bizarre injury....

name: Snow in the portrait
line: It's so inconvenient...... Hm......!?

name: White in the portrait
line: Look at the sky, Nero, Bradley!

name: Nero
line: .....? What are those things....? ......Wizards with wings....?

name: Bradley
line: ......No...... Those guys aren't wizards.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: They're the Magical Technology Corps of Central Country.

name: Bradley
line: Magical Technology Corps.......?

name: White in the portrait
line: Those who use machines fueled by mana stones to generate magic.

name: Snow in the portrait
line: Now let's see what they plan to do with the collapsed Central tower....

name: Rutile
line: Sir Sage, Sir Oz, look.....!

name: Arthur
line: That's our country's Magical Technology Corps....

name: Vincent
line: I wanted the Sage's wizards to perform the deed for us, but instead of a miracle, you staged us a comedy.

name: Vincent
line: Let me show you the power of our Magical Technology Corps.

name: Central Country man
line: Ah..... Look, wizards.....!

name: Central Country man
line: No...... Isn't that the Magical Technology Corps? I hear they obtained the technology from Western Country.

name: Central Country man
line: What are they doing...? Maybe they're going to fix the Central tower for us?

name: Central Country man
line: That would be great...... It feels awful seeing the tower collapsed like that.

name: Nicholas
line: The scene is even more disastrous than I expected...... I have to...... No, I will definitely fix this.

name: Central Country woman
line: Lord Nicholas!

name: Central Country man
line: It's the head of the Magical Technology Corps, Lord Nicholas!

name: Nicholas
line: We cannot repair the Central tower itself, but the power of the Magical Technology Corps is more than enough to repair the gates surrounding the tower. Witness the power of magical technology!

name: Central Country man
line: Incredible! It's just like magic......!

name: Central Country man
line: I'm amazed - is this really just technology? We have no need for wizards anymore!

name: Central Country woman
line: Ahaha, don't say that! The wizards just went through all that trouble to hold a fancy parade and all, too!

name: Central Country man
line: Hahahahahaha!

name: Mitile
line: So that's...... The power of the Magical Technology Corps...... ......Um, what's this technology they speak of......?

name: Rutile
line: Who knows...... I have no idea......

name: Narrator
line: At Shylock's low murmur, I turn to look at him. He gazes coldly across the expanse beneath the distant skies.

name: Akira
line: Eerie.....?

name: Shylock
line: It is absolutely chilling. There is no way to resist pleasure that comes without pain. They do not use their hearts, as wizards do; nor do they use their bodies, as humans do. If humans can simply achieve their wishes through the mere powers of stones.... They will recreate the world like children playing in a sandbox.

name: Murr
line: What are you looking at? Something fun? Something amazing?

name: Shylock
line: It may be fun and amazing to you. Take a look, Murr, genius of the ages. The magical technology you invented is creating a twisted miracle.

name: Akira
line: ....Murr invented....?

name: Shylock
