name: Cain
line: Nicholas...... Do you remember what you guys talked about? Why did he fall?

name: Owen
line: Um...... Because the town was destroyed.

name: Cain
line: Because the town was destroyed......?

name: Narrator
line: Owen smiles brightly and gives a tiny nod.

name: Cain
line: Can you give me some details?

name: Owen
line: Um...... Will you be proud of me if I remember?

name: Cain
line: Of course, of course. You got this.

name: Narrator
line: Even Cain's flippant praise makes Owen happy.

name: Owen
line: Um...... Nicholas wanted to become a wizard. The wizards are keeping it a secret, but if the moon falls, everyone can become a wizard. That's why, it's better to accept the moon, instead of pushing it away...... That's what he was told.

name: Akira
line: Who told him that......?

name: Owen
line: Nova.

name: Akira
line: Nova......

name: Owen
line: He helped with Nova's ritual, and that's what messed up the town. He said, "It's my fault, I can't do this anymore, I'm going to take responsibility and leap from here," and then he leapt.

name: Heathcliff
line: Take responsibility...... So that really was a suicide attempt?

name: Shino
line: Well, if you helped summon the < Great Catastrophe > and it ended up wrecking the whole world, I guess it would make you wanna die.

name: Akira
line: So Owen really never manipulated his heart...... If this was the Owen who was with Mister Nicholas back then, I can't imagine that he would've been capable of anything like that.

name: Shino
line: So is this happening to Owen because of his bizarre injury from the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Heathcliff
line: Most likely...... I can't believe Owen, who's like the embodiment of evil and fear, turned into this......

name: Shino
line: Isn't he better this way......?

name: Heathcliff
line: You're right......

name: Cain
line: No, I prefer him as he usually is. This just makes things hard for me......

name: Owen
line: Sir Knight, I remembered.

name: Cain
line: I'm so proud of you! I'm proud of you, and I'd also like you to remember a few more things. Who's Nova? What kind of guy is he?

name: Cain
line: Did Nicholas say anything?

name: Narrator
line: Owen's expression suddenly freezes. It's a face that I've seen before: he's frozen, as if at a loss. Cain is so focused on talking that he doesn't seem to realize.

name: Cain
line: Come on, Owen. Do your best, and try to remember. If you do, I'll praise you with my whole heart!

name: Narrator
line: Owen sneers and grabs Cain's chin.

name: Owen
line: What are you going to praise me for? Sir Knight.

name: Cain
line: This guy......

name: Narrator
line: The usual Owen stands there, grinning as coldly as always. He looks around the room and begins to form a sentence. But at that moment, the door opens.

name: Snow
line: Sage!

name: White
line: Sage, we figured it out! The identity of the Umbra Volans!

name: Heathcliff
line: Sir Snow, Sir White.

name: Snow
line: Oh, Owen. I didn't realize you came back to the magic headquarters.

name: Narrator
line: After a beat, Owen smiles leisurely.

name: Owen
line: I can come back whenever I want.

name: Cain
line: Stop putting up a front. If this is the same as when Nicholas fell, you shouldn't remember anything about what happened just now.

name: Owen
line: ......What do you mean, just now?

name: Cain
line: You were really attached to me.

name: Shino
line: You let me do your eyedrops.

name: Heathcliff
line: You wanted us to praise you......

name: Snow
line: My goodness...... So Owen's bizarre injury completely changes his personality?

name: White
line: Or perhaps it's his original.......

name: Owen
line: Don't be ridiculous. At least come up with something better.

name: Cain
line: What about this damp, dark place?

name: Cain
line: You said there was a picture book. Where a knight saves people who are in trouble......

name: Owen
line: I have no clue what you're talking about.

name: Snow
line: Where are you going, Owen!

name: White
line: We need your cooperation! Something horrible is about to happen!

name: Owen
line: Then there's really no reason for me to help. Because I love horrible things.

name: Narrator
line: Owen lifts his chin, a bone-chilling smile on his face.

name: Owen
line: The whole world should fall into madness - screaming, blood, and fear.

name: Narrator
line: And like smoke, Owen vanishes.

name: Cain
line: Dammit...... We were so close......

name: Heathcliff
line: But we got some really important clues out of him. We should be able to figure out what's going on once we interrogate Nicholas.

name: Shino
line: Snow, White. What about the identity of the Umbra Volans?

name: Snow
line: < The Omen of Umbra Volans >.

name: Shino
line: The Omen......?

name: White
line: A spell that was sealed away in ancient times...... The Festival of the City of the Dead.

name: Snow
line: It is a large-scale summoning spell where the dead of the lost city are brought back to life, and every living being is offered up as fodder for their revival.

name: White
line: < The Omen of Umbra Volans > is the bird that symbolizes the beginning of this festival.

name: Snow
line: Judging from the time it appeared - the dead should begin coming back to life tonight.

name: Cain
line: ......Oh god...... But wasn't the ritual performed at the Lunar Eclipse Palace supposed to summon the moon?

name: Snow
line: They offered old human bones instead of living sacrifices, right? That's why the ritual transformed.

name: White
line: Nicholas is a military man; his job is to protect the people. I suppose even he could not gather living humans.

name: Heathcliff
line: But according to the Western wizards, the same kind of ritual was conducted all over the world......

name: Shino
line: Some of them must've actually used living humans. This Nova guy might have guided them from the shadows. Snow, White. How do we stop this Festival of the City of the Dead?

name: Snow
line: Look for the moonstone that was used as the medium.

name: White
line: Unless we purify the moonstone, the Umbra Volans will materialize, and the dead will start to come back to life.

name: Shino
line: This is a great opportunity to make a name for myself. I'm headed to the capital.

name: Cain
line: I'll go too. I need to report this to Prince Arthur.

name: Heathcliff
line: I'll join you. What will you do, Sir Snow and Sir White?

name: Snow
line: Dusk is approaching. Once the sun has set, Oz cannot use magic.

name: White
line: Owen isn't around, so we need to secure Mithra's assistance. Sage, do help us convince him.

name: Akira
line: I understand.

name: Snow
line: Thank you. Mithra has been very irritable lately, you see.

name: White
line: It must be due to sleep deprivation. He needs to stop staying up all night......

name: Akira
line: Cain, Heathcliff, Shino. I'm counting on you.

name: Shino
line: We're headed off.

name: Heathcliff
line: Please take care, Sir Sage!

name: Cain
line: I apologize for leaving your side. Please leave the capital to us.

name: Akira
line: Got it! Please take care!

name: Narrator
line: The dead are coming back to life tonight...... I think of Snow and White's words, and a chill runs down my spine. I need to do what I can, and face each task in front of me in order to protect everyone. I take a deep breath and leave the room.

name: Snow
line: Mithra. Now, Mithra.

name: Mithra
line: What is it now...... People certainly enjoy speaking to me today.

name: White
line: This isn't the time to be lazing around. We're in serious trouble.

name: Mithra
line: Whose trouble? Not mine.

name: Snow
line: It will eventually be yours. Some people tried to summon the < Great Catastrophe >.

name: Mithra
line: The < Great Catastrophe >......? Why? Are they perverts?

name: Snow
line: Are they perverts?

name: White
line: Maybe it's their kink?

name: Akira
line: W-we don't know what their goals are. But according to Owen, someone named Nova is involved.

name: Mithra
line: Oh. I've never heard of him.

name: Snow
line: If we leave him alone, he might do the same thing again.

name: White
line: For now, the capital at Central is about to fall into grave danger. Could you lend us your strength?

name: Mithra
line: No, that sounds like a pain......

name: Snow
line: Mithra, dear!

name: White
line: Mithra, dear! Be a good boy!

name: Mithra
line: Couldn't you just ask Oz? That man can basically handle anything. Oh, right, he can't use his magic. How useless......

name: Oz
line: The sun is still up. I can easily cast a spell right now.

name: Oz
line: Would you like to see if I can control you as I wish, Mithra?

name: Mithra
line: And in turn I will make you my slave at night. Threatening me like this - you must have a request to make of me.

name: Oz
line: I do not make requests. For wizards do not act on requests. I always follow my own will.

name: Mithra
line: Exactly. I'll be a savior once a year - that's more than enough. I will spend the rest of the day sleeping.

name: White
line: Were you trying to persuade him without a plan in mind......?

name: Snow
line: Oh dear. So you just made Mithra mad, then......

name: White
line: If only Oz had a tiny fraction of Figaro's silver tongue......

name: Oz
line: ......That's enough.

name: Akira
line: Where are you going?

name: Oz
line: I'll put an end to everything before night falls.

name: Mithra
line: Oz. May I ask you something as well?

name: Oz
line: ......What is it.

name: Mithra
line: Why did you choose to serve? You used to be an emotionless, absolute ruler. Why should you care about the Central capital? You've been acting strange these past ten years or so. It's strange that you were summoned as a Central wizard in the first place. You're a Northern wizard through and through. You have no connections to Central Country whatsoever.

name: Oz
line: ............ There is no reason. I simply live as I please.

name: Mithra
line: Oh, is that so.

name: Narrator
line: Oz turns to walk away. Mithra closes his eyes in boredom. I pause for a moment before deciding to tell Mithra.

name: Akira
line: Oz...... I think Oz found something precious to him.

name: Mithra
line: ......Something precious?

name: Akira
line: What about you, Mithra? Don't you have something precious that you want to protect...... Could you please lend us your strength to protect that?

name: Snow
line: Mithra's connections with other wizards are few and far in between, after all......

name: White
line: He was close with Tiretta, but she has turned to stone.

name: Akira
line: Tiretta......?

name: Snow
line: The witch who raised Mithra like a mother.

name: White
line: Weren't they lovers? Though Tiretta ultimately married a human.

name: Narrator
line: Mithra raises his eyebrows at Tiretta's name.

name: Mithra
line: She was neither my mother nor my lover. Just an old, troublesome connection.

name: Snow
line: Is that so? When Tiretta found you as a child, she said, "He's handsome, so I'll make him my lover."

name: White
line: But then she said, "He grew up to be a pathetic man, so I decided against it."

name: Mithra
line: What a rude woman.

name: Snow
line: On the other hand, the Southern brothers grew up to be such good children. Rutile and Mitile are both so amiable.

name: Mithra
line: Rutile and Mitile? Do those two know Tiretta?

name: White
line: What are you saying? They're Tiretta's sons. You were invited to Rutile's birthday party, remember?

name: Mithra
line: Tiretta's sons......?

name: Narrator
line: Mithra's eyes open wide in shock. And then he jolts up, putting one hand to his mouth like he's just recalled something.

name: Snow & White
line: Ah?

name: Mithra
line: ......This is bad......

name: Narrator
line: Mithra turns pale in an instant. He stands up at once, and lifts his hand. Hurriedly, he draws a large rectangle in the air like he's tracing an invisible door.

name: Mithra
line: << Arthim >>

name: Narrator
line: The next moment, a completely different sight lies before our eyes: it's as if only that particular segment of space has been torn out of the air. On the other side lies the Central capital.

name: Snow
line: So you're finally in the mood to help us, Mithra.

name: White
line: Right, right, teleportation is a piece of cake for you! So you're going to take us along?

name: Mithra
line: No, this is a personal problem.

name: Snow & White
line: Mithra, dear......!!

name: Mithra
line: Excuse me.

name: Narrator
line: Before we know it, Mithra has vanished. The rest of us, left behind, just stare at the space where Mithra had been in blank amazement.

name: Akira
line: We couldn't persuade him......

name: Snow
line: No, I think that's not quite true.

name: Akira
line: What do you mean?

name: White
line: Judging from how panicked Mithra was...... He might have made some kind of promise with Tiretta.

name: Akira
line: Promise......?

name: Snow
line: Wizards use magic with their hearts. If they betray their hearts...... If they break a promise or a contract, they lose their magic.

name: White
line: That is why wizards do not make promises. Because when a wizard makes a promise he cannot keep, the mysterious powers he once controlled refuse to do his bidding.

name: Snow
line: Tiretta predicted her own death before she gave birth to Mitile.

name: White
line: There are only so many promises a mother would ask a powerful wizard to make if she foresaw her own death.

name: Akira
line: A promise Mithra made with Tiretta......

name: Narrator
line: I recall what Rutile said to me before, and come to a realization. What a young wizard who was a friend of his mother's said to him as a child...... "No matter what happens, I will protect you and your brother."

name: Rutile
line: Sigh...... I guess Mister Mithra really forgot...... It happened a long time ago, after all. It makes me sad, but there's nothing I can do about it......

name: Riquet
line: << Sunrotea Edif >>

name: Central Country child
line: Woah...... Magic sugar......

name: Riquet
line: It will help you recover your strength and lift your spirits - it can also work as a slight protection charm.

name: Central Country man
line: How much should we pay you......?

name: Riquet
line: No; I can't accept payment. Please make use of it.

name: Central Country man
line: Thank you!

name: Riquet
line: Fufu...... Everyone is happy.

name: Mitile
line: Riquet, your sugar is so neatly-shaped and pretty!

name: Riquet
line: Mitile, your sugar was also solidly packed and very delicious!

name: Mitile
line: Ehehe. Let's trade later!

name: Riquet
line: Let's!

name: Figaro
line: Sigh...... We still have lots of patients. There are fewer people with serious injuries now, but it looks like a lot of folks are having trouble sleeping.

name: Rutile
line: I heard the same thing. Apparently there's an eerie sound coming from below the earth.

name: Figaro
line: The air kind of feels dark, too - there was more rubble last time we came, but it seemed more lively. ......Maybe it's because of the magic circle in the Lunar Eclipse Palace, but I'm also getting a really awful feeling. Bradley, do you notice anything? Huh? Bradley?

name: Bradley
line: Alright, we made it inside. But what the hell's going on here......? The underlying balance is in complete chaos - there's no sense of order anywhere.

name: Nero
line: The Western wizards didn't make it sound this bad...... Maybe the contamination spread? Hey, I really think this is a bad idea, Bradley.

name: Bradley
line: What are you saying? We already made it this far. Just leave it to Bradley the Great. Let's get started. First up is the treasury......

name: Narrator
line: (Cawing)

name: Bradley
line: Watch out, Nero!

name: Nero
line: I can sense it approaching. Here it comes. But from which direction......

name: Narrator
line: (Cawing)

name: Bradley
line: From below! It's gonna swallow our shadows......!

name: Nero
line: << Adnodus Omnis >>!

name: Bradley
line: You all right!?

name: Nero
line: What the hell was that!? The shadow just passed beneath our feet!

name: Bradley
line: It's slithering up along the walls. We can't crush it if it has no physical form. Come on out, you overgrown chicken! Is cock-a-doodle-doo all you know how to do!? If you face me fair and square, the great Bradley will be your opponent-.... ............!

name: Nero
line: Hey...... What the hell is that...... Something's coming out of the wall......

name: Bradley
line: That hugeass beak......?

name: Nero
line: Haha...... Isn't that nice. It wants to play with you.

name: Bradley
line: Hey, nobody told me it was gonna be such a huge fucking bird!

name: Narrator
line: (Cawing)

name: Nero
line: ..........You're always like this! You taunt the enemy without thinking about what's going to happen next!

name: Bradley
line: Just run!

name: Nero
line: I'm never tagging along with you again!

name: Bradley
line: Okay, I get it! Let's leap out of that window! You take the right, I'll take the left! Let's go!

name: Narrator
line: (Crash)

name: Narrator
line: (Cawing)

name: Nero
line: ......The Lunar Eclipse Palace is gonna fall apart!

name: Bradley
line: That bird is fucking gigantic! How did it fit into that palace!? Ah, dammit, it's coming this way......!

name: Nero
line: Yes! Right was the better window! I'm always choosing the right from now on!

name: Bradley
line: Stop prattling on and help me out here....!

name: Nero
line: If you can turn it into grilled chicken, I'll carve it up nice and proper for you!

name: Bradley
line: Tch......! I'll shoot you down with my rifle, you giant bird bastard! << Adnopotensum >> !

name: Narrator
line: (Bang)

name: Nero
line: You hit it......!

name: Narrator
line: (Cawing)

name: Bradley
line: ......It's running away. Ahaha! Take that!

name: Nero
line: ......Hey...... It's headed towards the capital......

name: Nero
line: ......If that thing starts rioting in the city, it's gonna be a total disaster! I need to do something......!

name: Bradley
line: What, you're going!? I thought you hated humans!? What a joke, Nero!

name: Nero
line: Shut up! You don't need to come with me!

name: Bradley
line: Hey......! ............ Tch...... Fine, fine..... I can't have some damn bird messing with the rubble that I cleared up! Wait up, Nero!

name: Central Country man
line: This wind feels really creepy...... It's all warm and moist like someone's breath......

name: Central Country man
line: The sky is a really eerie color too...... It looks as red as a forest fire......

name: Central Country man
line: ......Hey, don't you hear something......?

name: Central Country man
line: Don't scare me like that......

name: Central Country man
line: But I can hear it...... It sounds like an army of bees buzzing...... Or an excited cow panting......

name: Central Country man
line: I want to go home before night falls, but it's getting dark already......

name: Central Country man
line: ......Ah, the sun is setting......

name: Narrator
line: (Hoot)

name: Central Country soldier
line: Ugh...... What an awful night keep watch over the cemetery......

name: Central Country soldier
line: We have no choice...... Sir Nicholas said that we can't let the wizards cause any more commotion.......

name: Central Country soldier
line: What......

name: Central Country soldier
line: ......Do you hear something......?

name: Central Country soldier
line: Cut it out, don't scare me......

name: Central Country soldier
line: ......Hey, don't you hear it...... It sounds like something wet being dragged along the ground, or like a frog being squashed...... Pitter patter....... A squelching sound......

name: Central Country soldier
line: Do you hear it?

name: Central Country soldier
line: B-behind you......
Grr...... Ggrrrr...... Roaaaarrrr.......!

name: Central Country soldier
line: Aaaaahhhhh......!

name: Figaro
line: ......The wind changed.

name: Rutile
line: Huh?

name: Figaro
line: Rutile, Mitile, Riquet. Gather your stuff. We're heading to the castle.

name: Mitile
line: What about Mister Bradley?

name: Figaro
line: He can probably manage. Things are looking pretty bad...... The chaos is spreading......

name: Riquet
line: Is something going to happen? Should we warn the people?

name: Figaro
line: Tell them to close their doors and windows tight, and absolutely avoid going outside tonight.

name: Riquet
line: Got i-....

name: Central Country woman
line: Kyaah......!

name: Central Country man
line: Aaaaagh, run......!

name: Mitile
line: ......! Everyone's running this way......! What happened over there!?

name: Rutile
line: Are those...... The living dead......!?

name: Central Country man
line: Help! Someone help me......!

name: Central Country woman
line: Eeeeeeek.....!

name: Figaro
line: << Possideo >>

name: Living dead

line: The twins step out of the portrait at the same time. And they fly upwards without using brooms. Like a large pair of wings protecting the castle, they float into the night sky and close their eyes. They clutch their dolls - which appeared from nowhere - to their chests, and murmur at the same time.

name: Narrator
line: A gentle light radiates from the two of them. The light spreads outwards and falls around them, encompassing the castle like a snowdome. The sight is so mystically beautiful that, for a moment, all my fear and anxiety falls away. The people who have gathered to take refuge in the castle breathe sighs of admiration.

line: Please do not worry about me. I am Sir Oz's pupil, after all.

name: Narrator
line: Arthur smiles and looks up at Oz.

name: Arthur
line: Isn't that right, Sir Oz?

name: Narrator
line: Oz gazes at Arthur without uttering a word. Oz's silence frustrates me. I wish he would just say something to Arthur. But after spending some time with him, I've come to understand him bit by bit. Oz treasures words. Because he's a wizard who treasures promises. Wizards do not make promises. For if they break their promises, they lose their power. That means...... They are very sincere and honest. How many promises have I made that I knew I would break - because I was carried away by the situation, and wanted to take the easy way out to make someone happy? Every time I broke a promise, I hurt someone, and I hurt myself. The wizards in this world don't do that. They don't sell their words short or throw them around lightly.

name: Oz
line: Be careful.

name: Arthur
line: Yes. Please take care of Sir Sage.

name: Narrator
line: Arthur stands on the balcony, taking out his broom. The people look up at his figure and break out in cheers. Their voices are by turns straightforward, by turns selfish - yet Arthur smiles through it all.

name: Arthur
line: I will be going now.

name: Narrator
line: Arthur soars into the sky. Towards the terrifying bird.

name: Central Country man
line: Prince Arthur will save us!

name: Central Country woman
line: Be careful, Prince Arthur!

name: Central Country man
line: Do your best......!

name: Narrator
line: Oz watches Arthur's back flying into the distance as if it's a blinding sight.

name: Cain
line: There's a barrier around the castle......! It must be Sir Snow and Sir White!

name: Shino
line: .....Now we just need Heath to get back to normal....!

name: Cain
line: The dead keep coming...... Looks like they headed this way after being repelled by the barrier.

name: Shino
line: We sure are popular tonight. Heath! It's me, Shino! Please return to your real self......!

name: Narrator
line: (Heath growling)

name: Cain
line: Are you all right, Shino!?

name: Shino
line: ......He just gave me a little scratch.

name: Cain
line: You're bleeding horribly. You've done enough; you should run awa......

name: Cain
line: ......They're so persistent!

name: Owen
line: << Cure Memini >>

name: Shino
line: The dead turned to dust in an instant......

name: Cain
line: Owen......

name: Owen
line: Hey. Is that beast Heathcliff?

name: Shino
line: .......He's not a beast.

name: Owen
line: He is a beast. Did you know I get along with beasts? I can make them serve me as I please.

name: Cain
line: You! Don't you dare lay a finger on Heath! I won't forgi-....

name: Owen
line: What can you do?

name: Owen
line: You're powerless. I'll ask again: what can you do? Stand back. You're in the way.

name: Shino
line: ......Don't get near him! << MatztzÄh Sudipas >>!

name: Owen
line: << Cuare Morito >>

name: Shino
line: ......! My legs...... I can't move!

name: Cain
line: I can't move my legs either...... Stop it, Owen! I'm begging you, please stop......!

name: Shino
line: Heath! Heath, run......!

name: Owen
line: Haha...... Come here, Heathcliff.

name: Shino
line: ......Heath calmed down......

name: Cain
line: ......Is he speaking to him......?

name: Owen
line: There, there...... Good boy. You're so cute, rubbing your cheek against my hand. Aren't you getting sleepy? That's right...... Playtime is over.

name: Cain
line: He's back to normal......!

name: Shino
line: Heath! ...... I can move my legs......

name: Owen
line: I've returned the favor. Don't you dare tell anyone about what happened to me before.

name: Faust
line: Someone's headed towards the bird...... It's Arthur......

name: Lennox
line: Sir Faust! There's a man with what looks like wings over there!

name: Lennox
line: It's Nicholas from the Magical Technology Corps. Does he intend to fuse with the bird......?

name: Faust
line: Hmph. << Satillquinart Mullcreed >>

name: Lennox
line: He's coming this way.

name: Faust
line: Is that so? How troublesome. I had absolutely no intention of helping Alec's descendant.

name: Lennox
line: You're a terrible liar, as always.

name: Faust
line: Whatever. He's coming; get ready.

name: Lennox
line: Yes.

name: Lennox
line: << Forsettao Meiuvat >>

name: Lennox
line: ......! He broke through the spell!

name: Faust
line: Leno!

name: Narrator
line: (Thump)

name: Faust
line: ......You're a wizard. Why did you default to close combat? Use magic.

name: Lennox
line: I'm sorry...... I just punched him reflexively......

name: Faust
line: That's enough. I'll put an end to you. It's time for you to fall into a deep slumber. << Satillquinart Mullcreed >>

name: Faust
line: ............ He turned to dust...... So he didn't become stone.

name: Figaro
line: Nicely done. Faust, Lennox.

name: Lennox
line: Dr. Figaro.

name: Faust
line: Stop spectating and help us out.

name: Figaro
line: You didn't need my help. By the way, have you seen Rutile and the others?

name: Rutile
line: Mister Mithra......!

name: Mithra
line: Impossible...... How could I be overwhelmed by any wizard aside from Oz......? Who are you? I should have at least heard of you if your magic is this powerful. Nobody knows of a wizard named Nova.

name: Nova
line: I have no business with you. Rutile of the South, hand over that child.

name: Rutile
line: I-I refuse......!

name: Mithra
line: Are you absolutely sure about this? Can't we just hand him over......?

name: Rutile
line: M-Mister Mithra, you can run away! I'll protect this child myself!

name: Nova
line: Well then, I'll take him by force.

name: Mithra
line: ......I won't let you. I can't have him turning to stone, you see.

name: Bradley
line: Mithra!

name: Nero
line: Rutile, are you okay!?

name: Mithra
line: ......! Bradley, Nero. Good timing......

name: Bradley
line: << Adnopotensum >>!

name: Rutile
line: M-Mister Mithra......!

name: Bradley
line: Hah......! I got him! Mithra's a difficult opponent, but the three of us can probably handle him together.

name: Nero
line: Yeah. I don't know who you are, but you put up a good fight. Good job.

name: Rutile
line: N-No! Mister Mithra saved me! That wizard is the one who ruined the whole capital!

name: Bradley
line: What!?

name: Nero
line: This guy!?

name: Mithra
line: ......Cough...... Bradley, Nero...... You really did it this time......

name: Bradley & Nero
line: Sorry, sorry!

name: Nova
line: Stop this charade. This is the end.

name: Mithra
line: << Arthim >> Rutile. Escape through this door.

name: Mithra
line: Come on, hurry. Please, don't die.

name: Rutile
line: ......All right.....!

name: Mitile
line: I wonder if Mister Bradley and Mister Nero are okay. They said not to follow them, but......

name: Riquet
line: ......I hope nothing scary happens......

name: Lennox
line: Mitile, Riquet.

name: Mitile
line: Mister Lennox......!

name: Figaro
line: Are you two all right?

name: Faust
line: Two children, alone in a place like this......?

name: Riquet
line: Figaro, Faust...... Bradley and Nero flew towards the sky over there to save Rutile!

name: Figaro
line: To save Rutile? From whom?

name: Mitile
line: Mister Mithra!

name: Narrator
line: (Flash)

name: Mitile
line: Nii-sama...! Are you all right!?

name: Rutile
line: Mitile, Riquet......

name: Figaro
line: You're injured.

name: Rutile
line: Dr. Figaro, please save this child!

name: Rutile
line: Something has been buried inside his stomach! Some wizard named Nova did it......

name: Figaro
line: ......This is...... The moonstone is inside him.....

name: Riquet
line: The moonstone....?

name: Faust
line: The young wizards should stay away from him. There's a horrendous amount of chaos spinning within him. It'll affect you.

name: Lennox
line: Come over here, Mitile, Riquet. Rutile, are you feeling okay?

name: Rutile
line: Y-Yes...... Can you save this child?

name: Figaro
line: Don't worry, Dr. Figaro is a skilled physician. ...But goodness, this is terrible. I can't believe he hid the medium inside a human body. Faust, please purify the surrounding area. Chaos will erupt the very moment I remove the moonstone. We need to ensure the order of this place isn't contaminated.

name: Faust
line: Leave it to me. << Satillquinart Mullcreed >>

name: Riquet
line: Ah...... It feels easier to breathe now......

name: Rutile
line: You can do it..... You'll feel better very soon.

name: Figaro
line: Let's begin. There's nothing to be afraid of.

name: Figaro
line: Shh. Quiet.

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: ......Don't steal it from me......!

name: Mitile
line: ......Wh-what's wrong......?

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: Fufu...... It's my jewel...... Mine...... Mine......

name: Figaro
line: It's not yours.

name: Skinny Central Country child
line: It's mine...... Uu......

name: Figaro
line: You have been swallowed by your role. You were made to take care of the moonstone - but that is not who you are. You have a name, don't you?

name: Figaro
line: Tell me your name. Even without the jewel - you are still you. You shine more beautifully than the moon. I know it's difficult to forget how you felt when that beautiful jewel was in your hands. But remember how you used to smile. You smiled happily, even without the jewel. That's what you need to take back. Remember your true self. What is your name?

name: Figaro
line: Jude. What a wonderful name for a hard worker. You're a hero, Jude. You have saved the capital. Thank you.

name: Figaro
line: << Possideo >>

name: Rutile
line: The stone is coming out......! Jude, you can do it......!

name: Figaro
line: ......There, got it.

name: Rutile
line: Thank goodness......!

name: Faust
line: The moonstone is in a terrible state.

name: Figaro
line: It doesn't look any different, but yes. If it falls into the hands of humans who know no better, they'll suffer misfortune after misfortune - people will surely die. Well, I guess this goes to Murr. It is the moonstone, after all.

name: Narrator
line: The giant bird - so large that it blankets the entire city - spreads its wings, circling above the castle. With every beat of its wings, a warm wind carrying the stench of blood blows through the air. The giant bird attacks the castle tower with its beak. But the snowdome barrier protects the castle.

name: Akira
line: Amazing......!

name: Oz
line: No...... At this rate, the barrier will reach its limit.

name: Oz is right
line: cracks flare up over the barrier every time the bird throws its beak against it. Uneasy murmurs rise up from the crowd. At that moment......

name: Arthur
line: << Pernoctant Nixzo >>!

name: Narrator
line: Arthur sits astride his broom in the sky with his grimoire open, and chants his spell. Light gathers around his grimoire, and turns into little glowing orbs. They fly at the giant bird, speeding like shooting stars. Arthur tears through the night sky, keeping pace with the orbs of light.

name: Narrator
line: (Cawing)

name: Narrator
line: The orbs strike the giant bird, and it lets out a terrifying screech of pure rage. It flaps its wings, and chases after Arthur who flies ahead of it.

name: Arthur
line: That's right! Come this way!

name: Narrator
line: I nervously chase Arthur's movements with my eyes. I glance at Oz, who is standing by my side. -Oz is asleep.

name: Oz
line: ......Sorry.

name: Narrator
line: Oz opens his eyes, and bitterly looks at his own hands. He must've fallen asleep trying to use his magic.

name: Oz
line: Sage.

name: Oz
line: When we saved Faust from the brink of death, you transferred magic to me. Can you do that again now?

name: Akira
line: Transfer magic to you......?

name: Oz
line: A sage is one who guides wizards. Theoretically, you should be able to grant me power and draw my power out from me.

name: Akira
line: ......I will try.

name: Narrator
line: Like I did that day, I place my hand in Oz's palm.

name: Akira
line: Is it working......?

name: Narrator
line: After a long silence, Oz shakes his head.

name: Oz
line: ......Nothing is coming across......

name: Akira
line: I'm sorry......

name: Narrator
line: At that moment, we hear lively voices from the sky. Wizards are gathering on their brooms.

name: Shylock
line: We're here to help.

name: Murr
line: It's the Umbra Volans! It's huge!

name: Rustica
line: I don't think it'll fit in my birdcage.

name: Chloe
line: C-can we really beat it?

name: Arthur
line: Let's work together! Thank you!

name: Narrator
line: The Western wizards have arrived. They circle the sky above the capital, taking their positions around the giant bird like a magic circle.

name: Narrator
line: (Screech)

name: Narrator
line: From the center, Arthur raises his voice.

name: Arthur
line: Let's go!

name: Arthur
line: Let's go!

name: Murr
line: Yeah!

name: Shylock
line: I'm ready whenever you are.

name: Narrator
line: Arthur lifts his grimoire high into the sky. Blue lightning flashes across the night.

name: Arthur
line: << Pernoctant Nixzo >>!

name: Murr
line: << Eanul Rambul >>!

name: Shylock
line: << Invibelle >>

name: Rustica
line: << Amorest Viesse >>

name: Chloe
line: << Suispicibo Voitengok >>!

name: Narrator
line: The lights that they release rush towards the bird with a tremendous ferocity. They gather into a single beam, which pierces its giant body.

name: Narrator
line: The giant bird lets out a cacophonous screech, writhing in pain and wildly flapping its wings. It opens its bright red beak and attacks Arthur.

name: Rustica
line: Watch out......!

name: Narrator
line: (Crash)

name: Arthur
line: Aaagh......!

name: Murr
line: Arthur!

name: Arthur
line: ......I'm all right!

name: Narrator
line: Part of the bird's wing strikes Arthur, and smoke rises from his shoulder. No matter how many times the Western wizards attack the bird, it pays them no attention. It persistently chases and attacks only Arthur.

name: Oz
line: Arthur......

name: Narrator
line: Oz grips the edges of the balcony, leaning over it.

name: Akira
line: Why is it attacking only Arthur......?

name: Oz
line: Because he's the prince of Central Country. The Umbra Volans is attached to him, for it too was born on Central ground.

name: Narrator
line: Frustrated, Oz clenches his hands into fists. Gradually, he turns to gaze towards the moon hanging in the sky, staring at it intensely. He glares at the glowing moon peeking through the expanse of large black wings, and mutters.

name: Oz
line: ......I won't let you have your way. Sage.

name: Oz
line: I'm sorry - but you are going to share my fate.

name: Narrator
line: Oz takes my shoulder, and we lean over from the balcony.

name: Akira
line: Hey...... Wai-!

name: Oz
line: Let's go.

name: Narrator
line: Oz leaps from the castle balcony, holding me in his arms.

name: Narrator
line: Dark wings, and a golden moon. We plummet swiftly.

name: Oz
line: Grant me strength, Sage. You are the one who guides us. Believe in me. I believe in you. Akira.

name: Narrator
line: I tightly grip Oz's hand in return. For I, too, once wished for the same. I want to build a small bridge of trust. With this world. With the people living in this world. And...... With myself. Oz slowly releases his fingers. In that hand, he holds a magnificent staff. I hadn't noticed, but the speed at which we're falling has slowed. I look at Oz. He opens his mouth.

name: Oz
line: << Vox Nox >>

name: Narrator
line: In that moment...... We defy the laws of nature. And rush upwards into the night sky. As if we're flying to the moon.

name: Nova
line: You'll be returning the moonstone.

name: Mithra
line: Rutile won't be coming back. Now it's easier for me to fight.

name: Nova
line: You think you stand a chance against me?

name: Mithra
line: Yes. For I am not alone.

name: Bradley
line: All right. Guess I'm already on board.

name: Nero
line: Geez. I thought I was comfortably retired......

name: Owen
line: Want me to help?

name: Bradley
line: Owen......

name: Owen
line: If you beg me, I'll help you out.

name: Mithra
line: Let's have some tea at the Central marketplace. I'll treat you to cake.

name: Owen
line: Yay. Who's this guy?

name: Mithra
line: Nova.

name: Owen
line: So this guy is Nova......

name: Bradley
line: Well then. Let's get this started. << Adnopotensum >>!

name: Nero
line: << Adnodus Omnis >>!

name: Nova
line: Hmph. No matter how many of you there are....

name: Owen
line: << Cure Memini >>

name: Owen
line: You can't move anymore. And now...... << Cuare Morito >>

name: Owen
line: I'll show you what's inside my trunk. He's furious at me for capturing him, so he's really savage. Inside this bag lies - hell. Cerberus, the watchdog of hell, will leap out.

name: Narrator
line: (Growling)

name: Owen
line: Huh, you managed to dodge his attack. But are you sure that's where you want to run?

name: Nova
line: What?

name: Mithra
line: << Arthim >>

name: Mithra
line: Welcome. I opened this door through space just for you - right into the magma reservoir of a blazing volcano. Please dissolve there, bones and all.

name: Nova
line: Hmph...... We'll meet again. For I am......

name: Mithra
line: << Arthim >>

name: Narrator
line: (Door closes)

name: Mithra
line: Sigh...... I'm tired......

name: Bradley
line: Hey......! You really should've listened to the end there!?

name: Mithra
line: Why?

name: Bradley
line: Because it sounded like he was about to tell us his identity and stuff!

name: Mithra
line: But I didn't want him to show up again......

name: Bradley
line: Even so......! God, you really are an idiot......

name: Mithra
line: Sigh...... It's fine. He was pretty badly injured, so he probably won't appear again for a while.

name: Narrator
line: (Growling)

name: Owen
line: Oh. I need to close my bag.

name: Nero
line: ......! Look at that! The clouds above the castle - lightning is striking in reverse towards the sky......!

name: Nero
line: What's with the strange reaction......?

name: Mithra
line: I've suffered through that more than enough times......

name: Nero
line: What?

name: Mithra
line: That lightning is Oz.

name: Oz
line: << Vox Nox >>

name: Narrator
line: (Thunder)

name: Narrator
line: (Cawing)

name: Narrator
line: Oz descends upon the night sky, cradling me with one arm. Every time he calmly raises his staff, tremendous claps of thunder reverberate across the skies. Bluish-white lights spread out like veins as far as I can see.

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz......!

name: Shylock
line: So you can use magic now.

name: Rustica
line: It's even more powerful than the rumors say......

name: Chloe
line: So this is Oz, the most powerful wizard in the world......

name: Murr
line: Ah......! The Umbra Volans is fleeing this way!

name: Narrator
line: Weakened by Oz's lightning, the giant bird flies unsteadily in the direction of Arthur and the rest of the wizards. The bird soars haphazardly through the sky at a ferocious speed, its bright red beak open.

name: Akira
line: Oz!

name: Narrator
line: Oz adjusts his grip on his staff like he's locking down his aim. He sharply narrows his eyes, fixing his gaze on the bird maniacally tearing through the dark night. Breaking out into a slight grin, he looks ready for a fight.

name: Oz
line: Don't think you can get away from me. I'll turn you into a skewer. << Vox Nox >>

name: Narrator
line: Oz raises his staff high.

name: Narrator
line: (Rumbling)

name: Narrator
line: The ground starts shaking tremendously. In the flash of an eye, the collapsed Central tower rises up beneath the giant bird.

name: Narrator
line: It happens at such a dizzying speed that the bird is left with no escape.

name: Central Country man
line: The tower...... Our tower was rebuilt in an instant......!

name: Central Country man
line: Is this a dream......!?

name: Narrator
line: (Cawing)

name: Narrator
line: The giant bird lets out a piercing screech, thrashing its wings. The reconstructed Central tower rushes up to stab the bird through its pure black head.

name: Central Country man
line: He took down the monstrous bird......!

name: Central Country man
line: The wizard defeated it......!

name: Narrator
line: The giant bird flaps its wings twice, thrice, and then limply collapses. Its body crumbles into countless black feathers.

name: Narrator
line: Which fall upon the city like rain. Amidst the light of the sunrise.

name: Shino
line: ......Feathers are falling from the sky......

name: Cain
line: Looks like it's all over......

name: Heathcliff
line: Nn...... Huh......? Why am I wearing Cain's jacket......?

name: Cain
line: Ah, umm......

name: Heathcliff
line: Huh!? Why am I naked!?

name: Shino
line: I'll tell you later.

name: Heathcliff
line: Shino, you're injured.

name: Shino
line: Don't worry about it. ......But let me say this first.

name: Shino
line: I'm so glad you're safe, Heath.

name: Bradley
line: Ew, gross. What's with these feathers......

name: Owen
line: The whole town is pitch black. This is fun.

name: Nero
line: Hey, this looks like trouble......

name: Mithra
line: Maybe it is......

name: Nero
line: The sky is filled with morning light, but the ground is as pitch-black as night..... What an inside-out and careless sight - just like wizards.

name: Bradley
line: What's with the sudden poetry......?

name: Nero
line: Shut up, Brad. Shut your mouth.

name: Rutile
line: All these black feathers......

name: Figaro
line: They won't do any good; we should purify them.

name: Mitile
line: But...... There's so many feathers. Can we really purify them all?

name: Faust
line: It'll be fine. There are twenty-one wizards. Everyone just needs to work together.

name: Faust
line: Did I say something strange?

name: Mitile
line: Eastern wizards like being alone, but you said everyone......

name: Faust
line: ......It really will be faster. Southern wizards specialize in working together, right? Lead us by example.

name: Mitile
line: Yes!

name: Riquet
line: Let's work hard! If we all work together, we'll be done in no time.

name: Lennox
line: You're right.

name: Lennox
line: Ah, are you awake?

name: Jude
line: The city is pitch black...... Am I still dreaming?

name: Figaro
line: Don't worry. It'll turn pure white soon enough.

name: Rustica
line: << Amorest Viesse >>

name: Central Country man
line: Woah...... The black feathers are glowing white and disappearing......

name: Central Country woman
line: Thank you, mister wizard!

name: Central Country man
line: Thank you!

name: Chloe
line: Ahaha, they're all waving to us! This reminds me of the parade! The tower has been repaired, and everyone looks so happy!

name: Shylock
line: You're right. Humans really are self-serving. But that must be what's endearing about them. ......Oh?

name: Chloe
line: What? Did you find something? A shard of purple sapphire...... Is this a piece of Murr's soul? I didn't realize there was one by the Central tower. I'm sure Murr will be delighted when we hand it to him. Shylo-....

name: Shylock
line: Gulp.

name: Chloe
line: Shylock!?

name: Shylock
line: Shh...... It's a secret.

name: Chloe
line: Um, a secret......

name: Murr
line: Shylock, I cleaned up my area!

name: Shylock
line: My, what a good boy you are. Can you handle another round?

name: Murr
line: I can!

name: Shylock
line: Then let's go.

name: Chloe
line: ............ I witnessed something I shouldn't have......

name: Cock Robin
line: Prince Arthur! I'm so glad you're all right!

name: Drummond
line: Squeak! Squeak squeak!

name: Arthur
line: That goes for you two as well - thank you for protecting the people. Ah...... Let me turn you back. << Pernoctant Nixzo >>

name: Drummond
line: ......Squee, squeak.... Prince Arthur......! How could you act so recklessly......!

name: Arthur
line: I apologize for making you worry. But I had the support of reliable comrades. That's right...... Let me introduce him once more. Sir Oz, Sir Oz!

name: Oz
line: Arthur......

name: Arthur
line: Please come over here.

name: Arthur
line: Let me introduce him to everyone here. He is the man who raised me, and my master of magic: Sir Oz.

name: Oz
line: ......I am Oz. Thank you for watching over Arthur.

name: Oz
line: Arthur is....... He's naughty, reckless, and brimming with curiosity, so it must have been difficult to take care of him.

name: Drummond
line: I-indeed, it's exactly as you say......! I thought my heart was going to stop yesterday!

name: Oz
line: I understand how you feel. When he was little, he stumbled across the fort of the Ice Witch while chasing a rabbit, and......

name: Arthur
line: Sir Oz, please don't tell him about my past! It's embarrassing!

name: Cock Robin
line: Ahaha! How strange...... This is just like a parent-teacher meeting!

name: Snow
line: My, goodness. I'm glad everything worked out in the end.

name: White
line: Sage, that was quite the undertaking.

name: Akira
line: Yes. But I'm glad everyone is safe. And I'm now hopeful that the misunderstandings about wizards will be resolved, little by little......

name: Snow
line: You're right. Everyone worked so hard.

name: White
line: Oh? Is that the king's younger brother......?

name: Vincent
line: Sir Sage.

name: Akira
line: Mister Vincent......

name: Vincent
line: The Sage's wizards saved us this time. I don't intend to thank you, but I would like to proceed with the inauguration ceremony that we had previously cancelled.

name: Snow
line: What's this all of a sudden?

name: White
line: I take it that you want us to stay silent about how Nicholas was involved in all this?

name: Snow
line: It was a huge mistake on your part, after all.

name: White
line: I wouldn't be surprised if the other countries demanded reparations from you.

name: Vincent
line: ...... What do you say, Sir Sage?

name: Akira
line: Of course, we'd be delighted to!

name: Central Country woman
line: Waaah......!

name: Central Country man
line: It's the new Sage and his wizards!

name: Central Country man
line: Congratulations on the inauguration ceremony!

name: Central Country woman
line: Thank you for saving us......!

name: Narrator
line: (Cheering)

name: Arthur
line: Thank you! Thank you, everyone!

name: Cain
line: What roaring applause! Even if I can't see everyone - I can still feel the sight before my eyes.

name: Riquet
line: I'm so glad everyone is safe and happy.

name: Oz
line: I agree.

name: Snow
line: Everyone looks like they're having fun.

name: White
line: How wonderful, how wonderful.

name: Mithra
line: This is the first time I've worn such formal clothing.

name: Owen
line: Me too. Matching clothes are weird and interesting.

name: Bradley
line: Hmph. Well, this doesn't feel bad.

name: Murr
line: << Eanul Rambul >>!

name: Narrator
line: (Fireworks)

name: Central Country woman
line: Woaah......

name: Narrator
line: (Cheering)

name: Shylock
line: Murr, you really do love fireworks.

name: Murr
line: I do~!

name: Rustica
line: I'm glad we could all wear your outfits together, Chloe.

name: Chloe
line: Yeah! I didn't think the Northern wizards would wear them too!

name: Shino
line: Not bad. I feel like I've taken over this castle.

name: Heathcliff
line: Hey, don't make such unsettling comments......

name: Nero
line: Geez, everyone can see me now...... Guess I have to close my restaurant in the East.

name: Faust
line: You should open shop in the magic headquarters. I'll drop by for a meal once in a while.

name: Mitile
line: Nii-sama! Everyone is smiling and waving at us!

name: Rutile
line: Yes. It makes me happy to see everyone smiling.

name: Lennox
line: Yes, truly.

name: Figaro
line: We all worked hard - that goes for everyone here, and the people in the castle and the capital, too. And you too, Sir Sage.

name: Narrator
line: I smile, nodding at Figaro's words. Everyone is smiling - the wizards standing on the balcony, and the people looking up at them. I hope we can see many more sights like this, as we continue to build these tiny bridges of trust. So that I can find a reason - no matter how small - in coming to this world and meeting these wizards. So that the story written in the sage's manual can end happily ever after.

name: Narrator
line: Ending Credits

name: Special thanks
line: Dear Sage

name: Rutile
line: ......By the way, did we ever figure out what Mister Mithra's bizarre injury is?

name: Murr
line: You're right, Mithra's the only one we haven't figured out yet. Mine is that lots of me's appear!

name: Mithra
line: I don't care. More importantly, I'm so sleepy......

name: Shino
line: Then go to sleep.

name: Mithra
line: I can't fall asleep, you see. That's why I haven't slept for days.

name: Arthur
line: That sounds horrible...... When was the last time you slept?

name: Mithra
line: The last time...... ......... I haven't slept for a while...... Ever since we fought the < Great Catastrophe >?

name: Arthur
line: Isn't that your bizarre injury......?

name: Murr
line: So dense......

name: Shino
line: So dense.......

name: Rutile
line: I'll give you some goods that will help you get a good night's sleep.
